3404.ko:
<voice 03677_00003404><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00001>: 말도 안 돼.
　아크로니아 광산에서 사망자가 나오다니…….<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3404.zh-Hans:
<voice 03677_00003404><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00001>不会吧？
阿库洛尼亚矿山竟然出现死者……<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3404.zh-Hant:
<voice 03677_00003404><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00001>不會吧？
阿庫洛尼亞礦山竟然出現死者……<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3405.en: <voice 03736_00003405><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>What does Mountain God Yppchal think he's doing!?<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3405.ja: <voice 03736_00003405><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>「山神イプチャルは　何してやがんだ！？<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3405.ko: <voice 03736_00003405><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>: 산신 이프찰은 대체 뭘 한 거야!?<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3405.zh-Hans: <voice 03736_00003405><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>山神伊普查尔到底在干嘛？！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3405.zh-Hant: <voice 03736_00003405><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>山神伊普查爾到底在幹嘛！？<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3406.en:
<voice 03780_00003406><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Mutch, Butch, you're not speakin' ill o' the Mountain
God, are you. He's a God after all... I'm sure this is
part of His plan.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3406.ja:
<voice 03780_00003406><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ムチェ　ブチャ　山神さまを
　悪く言うもんじゃねえ。
　神さまにだって……　きっと都合があるんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3406.ko:
<voice 03780_00003406><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 무체, 부차.
　산신님을 탓하지 마라.
　신께서도…… 분명 뭔가 사정이 있으실 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3406.zh-Hans:
<voice 03780_00003406><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>姆切、布切，不可以
说山神大人坏话。
神明一定……也有他们的难处。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3406.zh-Hant:
<voice 03780_00003406><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>穆切、布查，不可以
說山神大人壞話。
神明一定……也有祂們的難處。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3407.en:
<voice 03821_00003407><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00001>Tch! Some plan. As if an excuse like that will let
<pc> rest in peace!<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3407.ja:
<voice 03821_00003407><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00001>「チッ！　何が　都合だ。
　そんなことで片付けられちゃ
　死んだ　<pc>も　浮かばれねえぜ！<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3407.ko:
<voice 03821_00003407><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00001>: 흥! 사정은 무슨 사정.
　그런 말로 어물쩍 넘어가면
　죽은 <pc>도 억울해할걸!<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3407.zh-Hans:
<voice 03821_00003407><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00001>啧！什么难处啊，
找这种借口安慰自己，
死掉的<pc>也死不瞑目！<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3407.zh-Hant:
<voice 03821_00003407><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00001>嘖！什麼難處啊，
找這種藉口安慰自己，
死掉的<pc>也死不瞑目啦！<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3408.en:
<voice 03879_00003408><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>Besides, here recently, we haven't mined any decent
ore. If the Mountain God's plan is for us to live in
poverty, I ain't havin' it!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3408.ja:
<voice 03879_00003408><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>「それに　ここ最近　ろくな鉱石も採れねえし。
　神さまの都合で　ビンボー暮らしさせられちゃ
　たまったもんじゃねえよ！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3408.ko:
<voice 03879_00003408><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>: 게다가 요새는 광석도 거의 안 나오잖아.
　산신님 사정까지 이해해 가면서
　가난뱅이로 살고 싶진 않아!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3408.zh-Hans:
<voice 03879_00003408><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>而且最近没有采到什么好矿石。
因为神明的难处，而被迫过贫穷生活的话，
我可受不了！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3408.zh-Hant:
<voice 03879_00003408><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>而且最近沒有採到什麼好礦石。
因為神明的難處，而被迫過貧窮生活的話，
我可受不了！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3409.en: <voice 03902_00003409><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>Me 'n Butch are outta here, see. Bye!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3409.ja:
<voice 03902_00003409><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>「オレとブチャは　出ていかせてもらうぜ。
　あばよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3409.ko:
<voice 03902_00003409><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>: 나랑 부차는 떠나겠어.
　잘 있어라!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3409.zh-Hans:
<voice 03902_00003409><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>我和布切要出去了，
再见了！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3409.zh-Hant:
<voice 03902_00003409><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00001>我和布查要出去了，
再會啦！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3410.en: <voice 04055_00003410><start_lip_sync n00388 _normal m00001>Wait, Mutch! Butch!<stop_lip_animation n00388 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3410.ja: <voice 04055_00003410><start_lip_sync n00388 _normal m00001>「待つんだ　ムチェ！　ブチャ！<stop_lip_animation n00388 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3410.ko: <voice 04055_00003410><start_lip_sync n00388 _normal m00001>: 기다려, 무체! 부차!<stop_lip_animation n00388 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3410.zh-Hans: <voice 04055_00003410><start_lip_sync n00388 _normal m00001>站住，姆切！布切！<stop_lip_animation n00388 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3410.zh-Hant: <voice 04055_00003410><start_lip_sync n00388 _normal m00001>站住，穆切！布查！<stop_lip_animation n00388 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3411.en: <voice 04104_00003411><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Leave them be! If those guys want to go, let them go.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3411.ja:
<voice 04104_00003411><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ほっとけ！
　行きたいヤツは　行かせりゃいい。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3411.ko:
<voice 04104_00003411><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 놔둬!
　떠나고 싶은 놈은 떠나라고 해.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3411.zh-Hans:
<voice 04104_00003411><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>别管他们！
想去就让他们去。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3411.zh-Hant:
<voice 04104_00003411><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>別管他們！
想去就讓他們去。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3412.en:
<voice 04221_00003412><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>More importantly, for now, we should be praying for
<pc>, shouldn't we. So that they may rest
in peace...<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3412.ja:
<voice 04221_00003412><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「それよりも　今は　<pc>のために
　祈ってやろうじゃねえか。
　安らかな眠りに　つけるようによ……。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3412.ko:
<voice 04221_00003412><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 그보다 지금은
　{pc}|hpp(을,를) 위해 기도하지.
　편히 쉴 수 있도록…….<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3412.zh-Hans:
<voice 04221_00003412><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>现在更重要的，是帮<pc>
祈祷吧。
希望他能走得安稳……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3412.zh-Hant:
<voice 04221_00003412><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>現在更重要的，是幫<pc>
祈禱吧。
希望他能走得安穩……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3414.ja: <voice 04946_00003414><start_lip_sync n00389 _normal m00001>「ぬおおおおっ！？　<pc>？<stop_lip_animation n00389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3414.zh-Hans: <voice 04946_00003414><start_lip_sync n00389 _normal m00001>唔哦哦哦哦？！<pc>？<stop_lip_animation n00389 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3414.zh-Hant: <voice 04946_00003414><start_lip_sync n00389 _normal m00001>唔喔喔喔喔！？<pc>？<stop_lip_animation n00389 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3415.en:
<voice 05108_00003415><start_lip_sync n00390 _normal m00001>Aah, thank goodness! <pc> has come back to
life! Our prayers have been answered, haven't they!<stop_lip_animation n00390 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3415.ja:
<voice 05108_00003415><start_lip_sync n00390 _normal m00001>「ああ　よかった！
　<pc>が　息を吹き返したよ！
　マレレと　あたしたちの祈りが　届いたんだね！<stop_lip_animation n00390 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3415.ko:
<voice 05108_00003415><start_lip_sync n00390 _normal m00001>: 아아, 다행이다!
　{pc}|hpp(이,가) 살아났어!
　마레레와 우리의 기도가 통한 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00390 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3415.zh-Hans:
<voice 05108_00003415><start_lip_sync n00390 _normal m00001>哦哦，太好了！
<pc>活过来了！
玛蕾蕾和我们的祈祷生效了！<stop_lip_animation n00390 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3415.zh-Hant:
<voice 05108_00003415><start_lip_sync n00390 _normal m00001>喔喔，太好了！
<pc>活過來了！
瑪蕾蕾和我們的祈禱生效了！<stop_lip_animation n00390 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3416.en:
<voice 05174_00003416><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001><pc>... Are you really okay? It's almost
like another soul took up residence in your body...<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3416.ja:
<voice 05174_00003416><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「<pc>……　お前　本当に　大丈夫か？
　なんつうか　お前の身体に
　別の魂が　宿ったようにも見えたが……。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3416.ko:
<voice 05174_00003416><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: <pc>…… 너 정말 괜찮은 거냐?
　어쩐지 네 몸에
　다른 영혼이 들어간 것처럼 보였다만…….<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3416.zh-Hans:
<voice 05174_00003416><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001><pc>……你真的没问题吗？
该怎么说呢，你的身体
看起来好像有其他灵魂寄宿着……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3416.zh-Hant:
<voice 05174_00003416><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001><pc>……你真的沒問題嗎？
該怎麼說呢，你的身體
看起來好像有其他靈魂寄宿著……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3417.en:
<voice 05246_00003417><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>...No, based on your condition, you seem fine. Man,
you really gave us quite a scare there.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3417.ja:
<voice 05246_00003417><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「……いや　その様子なら　大丈夫そうだな。
　まったく　ヒヤヒヤさせやがって。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3417.ko:
<voice 05246_00003417><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: ……됐다, 보아하니 괜찮은 것 같구나.
　나 원, 사람 놀라게 하기는.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3417.zh-Hans:
<voice 05246_00003417><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……不，看这样子，应该是没事。
真是的，竟然让我担心。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3417.zh-Hant:
<voice 05246_00003417><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……不，看這樣子，應該是沒事。
真是的，竟然讓我擔心。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3418.en:
<voice 05263_00003418><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Marelle, she saved you, I tell ya. You'll have to
thank her somehow!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3418.ja:
<voice 05263_00003418><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「助かったぜ　マレレ。
　何か　礼をしねえとな！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3418.ko:
<voice 05263_00003418><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 고맙다, 마레레.
　뭔가 보답을 해야겠군!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3418.zh-Hans:
<voice 05263_00003418><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>帮大忙了，玛蕾蕾，
得好好回报你才行！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3418.zh-Hant:
<voice 05263_00003418><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>幫大忙了，瑪蕾蕾，
得好好回報妳才行！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3419.en: <voice 05339_00003419><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>No, thanks is fine. It's just... That...<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3419.ja:
<voice 05339_00003419><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>「いえ　お礼なんて　いいんです。
　ただ……　そのぅ………。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3419.ko:
<voice 05339_00003419><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>: 보답이라뇨, 괜찮아요.
　다만…… 그……….<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3419.zh-Hans:
<voice 05339_00003419><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>不用，不用这么客气，
只是……呃………<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3419.zh-Hant:
<voice 05339_00003419><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>不用，不用這麼客氣，
只是……呃………<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3420.en:
<voice 05419_00003420><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>Mr. Boss, do you think you could come with me to the
church? Ms. Lunana wants to speak with you.<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3420.ja:
<voice 05419_00003420><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>「親方さん。私と　一緒に
　教会へ　来ていただけないでしょうか？
　ルナナさんが　話がしたいって。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3420.ko:
<voice 05419_00003420><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>: 감독님, 저와 함께
　교회에 가 주시면 안 될까요?
　루나나 씨가 드릴 말씀이 있대서요.<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3420.zh-Hans:
<voice 05419_00003420><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>老大，可以请你跟我
一起前往教会吗？
露娜娜说她有话想说。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3420.zh-Hant:
<voice 05419_00003420><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>師傅，可以請你跟我
一起前往教會嗎？
露娜娜說她有話想說。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3421.ja: <voice 05485_00003421><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ルナナが！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3422.en:
<voice 05524_00003422><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Tsk... That damned human girl. She won't get off these
trifling talks, no matter how many time I tell her,
the persistent fool!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3422.ja:
<voice 05524_00003422><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「チッ……。あの人間の小娘め。
　テメエの　くだらん話には乗らんと
　何度も言っておるのに　しつこいヤツだ！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3422.ko:
<voice 05524_00003422><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 쳇……. 그 인간 계집.
　그 녀석의 시답잖은 이야기에는 안 끼겠다고
　그렇게 얘기했는데, 정말 끈질기군!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3422.zh-Hans:
<voice 05524_00003422><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>啧……那个人类小姑娘。
我已经说过好几次，
不会再听她那些无聊的话，真是缠人！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3422.zh-Hant:
<voice 05524_00003422><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>嘖……那個人類的小姑娘。
我已經說過好幾次，
不會再聽她那些無聊的話，真是纏人！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3423.en:
<voice 05549_00003423><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>She has the nerve to assume I'll take it easy on her
just because she's Father Holta's daughter...<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3423.ja:
<voice 05549_00003423><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「世話になった　ホルタ神父の娘だと思って
　甘い顔をしていれば　つけ上がりやがって……。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3423.ko:
<voice 05549_00003423><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 그간 신세 진 홀터 신부님의 딸이라
　좋게 좋게 얘기하니 정도를 모르는군…….<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3423.zh-Hans:
<voice 05549_00003423><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>我本想说她是霍尔达神父的女儿，我受神父照顾，
才对她客气，结果她竟然得意忘形……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3423.zh-Hant:
<voice 05549_00003423><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>我本來想說她是霍爾達神父的女兒，我受他照顧，
所以才對她客氣，結果她竟然不知好歹……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3424.en: <voice 05590_00003424><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>Um... Mr. Boss...?<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3424.ja: <voice 05590_00003424><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>「あの……　親方さん………？<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3424.ko: <voice 05590_00003424><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>: 저…… 감독님………?<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3425.ja: <voice 05649_00003425><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「あ　ああ……。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3425.ko: <voice 05649_00003425><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 어, 어어…….<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3426.en:
<voice 05704_00003426><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>...So. To Lunana's. Yeah. Marelle, you having saved
<pc>, I can't refuse, can I now.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3426.ja:
<voice 05704_00003426><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「……そうか。ルナナの所へな。うん。
　マレレには　<pc>を助けてもらったし
　行かないわけには　いかねえな。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3426.ko:
<voice 05704_00003426><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 루나나에게 말이지. 알았다.
　마레레는 {pc}|hpp(을,를) 구해 주었으니
　당연히 같이 가야지.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3426.zh-Hans:
<voice 05704_00003426><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……这样啊，要去露娜娜那边啊。嗯，
玛蕾蕾救了<pc>，
不去不行哪。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3426.zh-Hant:
<voice 05704_00003426><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……這樣啊，要去露娜娜那邊啊。嗯，
瑪蕾蕾救了<pc>，
不去不行哪。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3428.en:
<voice 05783_00003428><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Itーit's no use. For some reason I'm sick to my
stomach, and my head hurts, and I feel dizzy...
*cough, cooough*!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3428.ja:
<voice 05783_00003428><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ダ　ダメだ。
　なんだか　腹が痛いし　頭も痛いし
　めまいがする……ゲホ　ゲホッ！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3428.ko:
<voice 05783_00003428><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 아, 안 되겠어.
　어쩐지 갑자기 배도 아프고, 머리도 아프고
　현기증까지 나서…… 콜록, 콜록!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3428.zh-Hans:
<voice 05783_00003428><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>不、不行，
我觉得肚子痛，头也好痛，
还很晕眩……咳咳、咳咳！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3428.zh-Hant:
<voice 05783_00003428><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>不、不行，
我覺得肚子痛，頭也好痛，
還很暈眩……咳咳、咳咳！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3429.en:
<voice 05796_00003429><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Unfortunately, I don't seem to be well enough to go
to Lunana's place now... Could someone else go in my
stead?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3429.ja:
<voice 05796_00003429><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「残念だが　ルナナの所へは
　行けそうにないなあ……。
　誰か　オレの代わりに　行ってくれねえかな？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3429.ko:
<voice 05796_00003429><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 아쉽지만 루나나에게는
　못 갈 것 같군…….
　누가 나 대신 다녀와 주겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3429.zh-Hans:
<voice 05796_00003429><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>真遗憾，我似乎去不了
露娜娜那边了……
有人要代替我去吗？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3429.zh-Hant:
<voice 05796_00003429><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>真遺憾，我似乎去不了
露娜娜那邊了……
有人要代替我去嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3430.en: <voice 05974_00003430><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Ooh! That's right, <pc>! You go for me!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3430.ja:
<voice 05974_00003430><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「おおっ！　そうか　<pc>！
　お前が　行ってくれるか！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3430.ko:
<voice 05974_00003430><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 오오! 그래, <pc>!
　네가 대신 가 주겠다고!?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3430.zh-Hans:
<voice 05974_00003430><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>哦！这样啊，<pc>！
你愿意去啊！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3430.zh-Hant:
<voice 05974_00003430><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>喔！這樣啊，<pc>！
你願意去啊！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3431.en:
<voice 06017_00003431><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>That's right, isn't it. You've gotta say your thanks
for your life being saved at the church anyway. While
you're at it, you can visit Lunana's place.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3431.ja:
<voice 06017_00003431><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「そうだよな。お前は　命を助けてもらった
　礼を言いに　教会まで行かないとな。
　ついでに　ルナナの所へ　寄るといい。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3431.ko:
<voice 06017_00003431><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 그래 그래, 네 목숨을 구해 주었으니
　교회에 인사하러 다녀와야지.
　가는 김에 루나나도 만나고 오거라.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3431.zh-Hans:
<voice 06017_00003431><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>也是，你得去教会，
跟人家谢谢救了你一命。
顺便再去露娜娜那边吧。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3431.zh-Hant:
<voice 06017_00003431><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>也是，你得去教會，
跟人家謝謝救了你一命。
順便再去露娜娜那邊吧。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3432.en:
<voice 06073_00003432><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001><pc>! Go see Lunana and tell it to her like
it is.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3432.ja:
<voice 06073_00003432><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「<pc>！
　ルナナのヤツに　ビシッと言ってこい。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3432.ko:
<voice 06073_00003432><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: <pc>!
　루나나 그 녀석에게 똑똑히 전하거라.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3432.zh-Hans:
<voice 06073_00003432><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001><pc>！
你要跟露娜娜那家伙说清楚。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3432.zh-Hant:
<voice 06073_00003432><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001><pc>！
你要對露娜娜那傢伙狠狠說個幾句。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3433.en:
<voice 06093_00003433><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Tell her the Boss says absolutely not. And to never
again call for the Boss!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3433.ja:
<voice 06093_00003433><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「親方は　絶対に　イヤだと言っている。
　もう二度と　親方を呼んだりするなと！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3433.ko:
<voice 06093_00003433><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 감독님은 죽어도 싫다고 하셨으니
　다시는 감독님을 부르지 말라고 말이다!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3433.zh-Hans:
<voice 06093_00003433><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>告诉她不要再找我了，
老大我绝对不答应！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3433.zh-Hant:
<voice 06093_00003433><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>跟她說，師傅堅決拒絕。
叫她別再找師傅了！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3434.en: <voice 06149_00003434><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Now then, I'm countin' on ya, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3434.ja: <voice 06149_00003434><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「では　頼んだぞ　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3434.ko: <voice 06149_00003434><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 그럼 잘 부탁하마, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3434.zh-Hans: <voice 06149_00003434><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>那就拜托你了，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3434.zh-Hant: <voice 06149_00003434><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>那就拜託你了，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3435.ja: <voice 06181_00003435><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ゲホゲホ　ゴーホゴホッ……！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3435.ko: <voice 06181_00003435><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 콜록콜록, 쿨럭쿨럭……!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3435.zh-Hans: <voice 06181_00003435><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>咳咳咳咳、咳咳咳咳……！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3435.zh-Hant: <voice 06181_00003435><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>咳咳咳咳、咳咳咳咳……！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3436.en: <voice 06350_00003436><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>Is is alright, I wonder... Mr. Boss..<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3436.ja: <voice 06350_00003436><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>「大丈夫かしら……　親方さん。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3436.ko: <voice 06350_00003436><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>: 감독님…… 괜찮으실까요?<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3436.zh-Hans: <voice 06350_00003436><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>没事吧……老大。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3436.zh-Hant: <voice 06350_00003436><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>沒事吧……師傅。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3437.en:
<voice 06477_00003437><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>Well, I shall return to the church, but... If you need
anything again, please call for me.<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3437.ja:
<voice 06477_00003437><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>「では　私は　教会に戻りますけど……
　また何かあったら　呼んでください。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3437.ko:
<voice 06477_00003437><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>: 그럼 전 교회로 돌아갈 테니……
　또 무슨 일 있으면 연락 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3437.zh-Hans:
<voice 06477_00003437><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>那我回教会了……
要是有什么事，请再叫我。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3437.zh-Hant:
<voice 06477_00003437><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>那我回教會了……
要是有什麼事，請再叫我。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3438.en:
<voice 06550_00003438><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001><pc>, later on, please visit Lunana, who is
living in the upper part of town's church, okay.<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3438.ja:
<voice 06550_00003438><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんは　のちほど
　上の町の教会に住んでいる
　ルナナさんを　訪ねてくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3438.ko:
<voice 06550_00003438><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨는 나중에
　윗마을 교회에 사는
　루나나 씨를 찾아가 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3438.zh-Hans:
<voice 06550_00003438><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001><pc>，之后请去
拜访住在上方城镇教会的
露娜娜吧。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3438.zh-Hant:
<voice 06550_00003438><start_lip_sync n00391 _normal m00001><pc>，之後請去
拜訪住在上方市鎮教會的
露娜娜吧。<stop_lip_animation n00391 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3439.en:
<voice 00125_00003439><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>As usual, you've entered without knocking, haven't
you, Hottsi.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3439.ja:
<voice 00125_00003439><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「相変わらず　ノックもなしに
　入っていらっしゃるのね　ホッツィさん。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3439.ko:
<voice 00125_00003439><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 노크도 안 하고 들어오는 건
　여전하네요, 홋찌 씨.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3439.zh-Hans:
<voice 00125_00003439><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>你还是一样都不敲门
就进来了啊，霍崔。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3439.zh-Hant:
<voice 00125_00003439><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>你還是一樣都不敲門
就進來了啊，霍崔。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3440.en:
<voice 00200_00003440><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>But...I shouldn't get angry, should I? You're here so
early, after all. I'm expecting you to give me a good
answer today, alright?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3440.ja:
<voice 00200_00003440><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「でも……　怒ったりなんてしなくてよ？
　こんなに早く　来てくださったんだもの。
　今日こそ　いい返事を　お聞かせ願えるのよね？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3440.ko:
<voice 00200_00003440><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 하지만…… 화내진 않을게요.
　이렇게 빨리 찾아와 주셨으니까요.
　오늘은 긍정적인 대답을 기대해도 되는 거죠?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3440.zh-Hans:
<voice 00200_00003440><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>不过……我可不会生气哦，
毕竟你这么快就过来了啊。
今天可以听到你正面的回答吧？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3440.zh-Hant:
<voice 00200_00003440><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>不過……我可不會生氣喔，
畢竟你這麼快就過來了啊。
今天可以聽到你正面的回答吧？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3441.en: <voice 00421_00003441><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>If you leave it to me, I won't mess it up.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3441.ja:
<voice 00421_00003441><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「このルナナに　まかせてくだされば
　決して　悪いようには　いたしませんわ。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3441.ko:
<voice 00421_00003441><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 저 루나나에게 맡겨 주시면
　절대 실망시켜 드리지 않겠어요.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3441.zh-Hans:
<voice 00421_00003441><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>只要交给我露娜娜，
一定不会让你吃亏的。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3441.zh-Hant:
<voice 00421_00003441><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>只要交給我露娜娜，
一定不會讓你吃虧的。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3442.ja: <voice 00530_00003442><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ねっ　ホッツィさん<heart><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3442.ko: <voice 00530_00003442><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 네? 홋찌 씨<heart><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3442.zh-Hans: <voice 00530_00003442><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>是吧，霍崔<heart><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3442.zh-Hant: <voice 00530_00003442><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>是吧，霍崔<heart><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3443.en: <voice 00650_00003443><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>...WHO THE HECK ARE YOU!?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3443.ja: <voice 00650_00003443><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「……って　誰よ　あんた！？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3443.ko: <voice 00650_00003443><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: ……잠깐, 넌 뭐야!?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3443.zh-Hans: <voice 00650_00003443><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>……哎，你是谁啊？！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3443.zh-Hant: <voice 00650_00003443><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>……欸，你是誰啊！？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3444.en:
<voice 00700_00003444><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>...Huh!? You're here to give me a reply on the boss'
behalf?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3444.ja:
<voice 00700_00003444><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「……はあッ！？
　親方の代理で　返事をしにきたですって？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3444.ko:
<voice 00700_00003444><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: ……뭐!?
　감독님 대신 대답을 전하러 왔다고?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3444.zh-Hans:
<voice 00700_00003444><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>……什么？！
你说你代替老大来给我回复？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3444.zh-Hant:
<voice 00700_00003444><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>……什麼！？
你說你代替師傅來給我回覆？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3445.en: <voice 00865_00003445><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>He has some nerve, doesn't he, that OLD COOT!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3445.ja: <voice 00865_00003445><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「いい度胸ね　あのクソ親父！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3445.ko: <voice 00865_00003445><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 배짱 한번 좋네, 그 망할 영감!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3445.zh-Hans: <voice 00865_00003445><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>胆子还真不小，那个混蛋老爹！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3445.zh-Hant: <voice 00865_00003445><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>膽子還真不小，那個渾蛋老爹！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3446.en: <voice 00915_00003446><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Ignoring my kindness like that, ridiculous!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3446.ja:
<voice 00915_00003446><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「この　あたしの厚意を　無視するなんて
　ありえないわッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3446.ko:
<voice 00915_00003446><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 감히 내 호의를 무시하다니
　기가 막혀서!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3446.zh-Hans:
<voice 00915_00003446><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>竟敢无视我的好意，
岂有此理！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3446.zh-Hant:
<voice 00915_00003446><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>竟敢無視我的好意，
豈有此理！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3447.en: <voice 01020_00003447><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Wh... Why are you still here?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3447.ja: <voice 01020_00003447><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「な……何よ。あんた　まだいたの？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3447.ko: <voice 01020_00003447><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 뭐…… 뭐야, 너 아직 안 갔어?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3447.zh-Hans: <voice 01020_00003447><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>怎……怎么，你还在啊？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3447.zh-Hant: <voice 01020_00003447><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>怎……怎樣啦，你還在啊？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3448.en: <voice 01095_00003448><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Ahh, I don't need the boss's answer anyway.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3448.ja: <voice 01095_00003448><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「あー　親方の返事なら　いらないわよ。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3448.ko: <voice 01095_00003448><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 아, 감독님 대답은 안 들려줘도 돼.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3448.zh-Hans: <voice 01095_00003448><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>唉——如果是老大的回复，我不需要了。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3448.zh-Hant: <voice 01095_00003448><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>唉──如果是師傅的回覆，我不需要了。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3449.en:
<voice 01175_00003449><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>He sent you, because he doesn't want to talk to me
after all. He told you to turn me down, right?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3449.ja:
<voice 01175_00003449><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「代理をよこすぐらい
　あたしと　話したくないんだもの。
　断ってこいって　言われたんでしょ？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3449.ko:
<voice 01175_00003449><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 대리인을 보낼 만큼
　나와 얘기하기 싫단 거잖아.
　보나 마나 거절하고 오라고 한 거지?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3449.zh-Hans:
<voice 01175_00003449><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>毕竟他都懒得和我说话，
还派代替的人来。
反正他叫你拒绝我对吧？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3449.zh-Hant:
<voice 01175_00003449><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>畢竟他都懶得和我說話，
還派代替的人來。
反正他叫你拒絕我對吧？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3451.en:
<voice 01380_00003451><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>You know, on closer inspection, you're a little different
from the people down in the town below. Almost
Human, one might say.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3451.ja:
<voice 01380_00003451><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「あなた　よく見ると　下の町のヤツらとは
　どことなーく　ちがってるのね。
　みょうに　人間っぽいっていうか？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3451.ko:
<voice 01380_00003451><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 너, 가만 보니 아랫마을 녀석들하고는
　뭔가 좀 다르다?
　은근히 인간 같은 구석이 있달까?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3451.zh-Hans:
<voice 01380_00003451><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>仔细一看，你好像跟
下方城镇的家伙们不太一样啊。
有点像是人类呢？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3451.zh-Hant:
<voice 01380_00003451><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>仔細一看，你好像跟
下方市鎮的傢伙們不太一樣啊。
有點像是人類呢？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3452.en:
<voice 01460_00003452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>...Heh, so you're called <pc>? Well, <pc>,
here's an order for you then.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3452.ja:
<voice 01460_00003452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「……へえ　<pc>っていうの？
　じゃあ　命令するわ　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3452.ko:
<voice 01460_00003452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: ……흐음, {pc}|hpp(이라,라)고?
　그럼 명령 하나 할게, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3452.zh-Hans:
<voice 01460_00003452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>……哦，你叫<pc>啊？
那我命令你，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3452.zh-Hant:
<voice 01460_00003452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>……喔，你叫做<pc>啊？
那我命令你，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3453.en: <voice 01540_00003453><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>You have to become my servant!<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3453.ja: <voice 01540_00003453><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「あなた　あたしの下僕になりなさいッ！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3453.ko: <voice 01540_00003453><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 너, 내 부하가 되도록 해!<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3453.zh-Hant: <voice 01540_00003453><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>你要成為我的僕人！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3454.en:
<voice 01638_00003454><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>I didn't quite catch thaaat. <pc>, YOU WILL
be my servant, WON'T YOU?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3454.ja:
<voice 01638_00003454><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「よく　聞こえなかったわ。
　<pc>　あなた
　あたしの下僕に　なるわよねッ！？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3454.ko:
<voice 01638_00003454><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 뭐라고? 잘 안 들렸어.
　<pc>, 너
　내 부하가 될 거지!?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3454.zh-Hans:
<voice 01638_00003454><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我听不清楚。
<pc>，你要
当我的仆人吧？！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3454.zh-Hant:
<voice 01638_00003454><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我聽不清楚。
<pc>，你要
成為我的僕人吧！？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3455.en: <voice 01690_00003455><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Good answer, <pc>. Oh, how lucky you are.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3455.ja:
<voice 01690_00003455><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「いい返事ね　<pc>。
　あなたは　幸せ者よ。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3455.ko:
<voice 01690_00003455><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 나와야지, <pc>.
　운 좋은 줄 알아.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3455.zh-Hans:
<voice 01690_00003455><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>答得好！<pc>。
你很幸运。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3455.zh-Hant:
<voice 01690_00003455><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>答得好！<pc>。
你很幸運。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3456.en:
<voice 01872_00003456><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>I'm going to be the savior of Agrani and become even
more of a hero than my father. And you'll go down in
history as my servant!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3456.ja:
<voice 01872_00003456><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「あたしは　このアグラニの救世主となり
　父以上の英雄に　なるんだから。
　あなたも　下僕として　歴史に名を残せるわよ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3456.ko:
<voice 01872_00003456><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 난 이 아그라니의 구세주가 돼서
　아버지보다 위대한 영웅이 될 거거든.
　너도 내 부하로 역사에 이름이 남게 될 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3456.zh-Hans:
<voice 01872_00003456><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我会成为阿古拉尼的救世主，
成为超越父亲的英雄。
你也可以作为我的仆人，留名青史！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3456.zh-Hant:
<voice 01872_00003456><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我會成為阿古拉尼的救世主，
成為超越父親的英雄。
你也可以作為我的僕人，留名青史！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3457.en:
<voice 02026_00003457><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>So <pc>. You know how the Acronia Mine
hasn't produced any decent ore, let alone gems, these
last few years, don't you?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3457.ja:
<voice 02026_00003457><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「<pc>。ここ数年　アクロニア鉱山から
　宝石はおろか　まともな鉱石すら
　出ていないことは　知ってるわよね？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3457.ko:
<voice 02026_00003457><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 너도 최근 몇 년간
　아크로니아 광산에서 보석은커녕
　변변한 광석도 안 나오는 거 알지?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3457.zh-Hans:
<voice 02026_00003457><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001><pc>，你知道阿库洛尼亚矿山
这几年别说是宝石，
连矿石都不怎么出现了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3457.zh-Hant:
<voice 02026_00003457><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001><pc>，你知道阿庫洛尼亞礦山
這幾年別說是寶石，
連礦石都不怎麼出現了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3458.en:
<voice 02101_00003458><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>But I've got it all figured out. I know where to dig in
Acronia Mine to find a whole horde of gems...!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3458.ja:
<voice 02101_00003458><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「でも　あたしは知っているの。
　アクロニア鉱山の　どこを掘れば
　宝石が　ザクザク出るのかを……！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3458.ko:
<voice 02101_00003458><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 하지만 난 알아.
　아크로니아 광산 어디를 파면
　보석이 우수수 쏟아지는지……!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3458.zh-Hans:
<voice 02101_00003458><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>但我知道，
要挖矿山的哪里，
宝石才会大量出现……！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3458.zh-Hant:
<voice 02101_00003458><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>但我知道，
知道要挖礦山的哪裡，
寶石才會大量出土……！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3459.en:
<voice 02171_00003459><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>I've been combing through every book in Agrani, and I'm
pretty sure I've found something!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3459.ja:
<voice 02171_00003459><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「アグラニの町の　書物という書物を調べて
　探り当てた情報だから　間違いないわ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3459.ko:
<voice 02171_00003459><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 아그라니 마을의 책이란 책은 다 뒤져서
　찾아낸 정보니 틀림없어!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3459.zh-Hans:
<voice 02171_00003459><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>这是我调查阿古拉尼镇的书籍后
发现的情报，所以不会有错！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3459.zh-Hant:
<voice 02171_00003459><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>這是我調查阿古拉尼鎮的書籍後
發現的情報，所以不會有錯！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3462.en:
<voice 02242_00003462><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>But, you know, the boss has some whack job reason for
not wanting to dig in that one spot! Man, I don't get it!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3462.ja:
<voice 02242_00003462><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「でもね　あの親方ったら　おかしな理由をつけて
　その場所だけは　掘らないって言うのよ！
　まったく　理解不能だわッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3462.ko:
<voice 02242_00003462><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 그런데 그 감독님, 이상한 이유를 대면서
　거기만은 절대 안 파겠다고 하지 뭐야!
　정말, 이해가 안 돼!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3462.zh-Hans:
<voice 02242_00003462><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>但那个老大真讨厌，找个奇怪的理由，
说只有那里不可以开挖！
实在无法理解！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3462.zh-Hant:
<voice 02242_00003462><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>可是那個師傅卻找了個奇怪的理由
就說唯獨那裡不能開挖！
真是莫名其妙！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3463.en:
<voice 02321_00003463><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>It seems like all the people in the town below are at the
boss's mercy, but...<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3463.ja:
<voice 02321_00003463><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「下の町のヤツらは　どいつも　こいつも
　親方の言いなりみたいだけど……<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3463.ko:
<voice 02321_00003463><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 아랫마을 녀석들은 죄다
　감독 말이라면 꼼짝도 못 하지만……<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3463.zh-Hans:
<voice 02321_00003463><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>下方城镇的家伙，每个人
都对老大唯唯诺诺的……<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3463.zh-Hant:
<voice 02321_00003463><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>下方市鎮的傢伙，每個人好像
都對師傅唯唯諾諾的……<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3464.en:
<voice 02442_00003464><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>But don't you think people would listen if a sage who's a
bigger deal than their boss said they could dig there?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3464.ja:
<voice 02442_00003464><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「親方よりもエラい　賢者サマが
　そこを　掘ってもいいって言ったら
　みんな聞くと　思わない？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3464.ko:
<voice 02442_00003464><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 현장 감독보다 더 대단한 현자님이
　거길 파도 된다고 하면
　다들 순순히 따르지 않겠어?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3464.zh-Hans:
<voice 02442_00003464><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>但要是比老大更了不起的贤者大人
说可以挖那边的话，你不觉得
大家应该都会听从吗？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3464.zh-Hant:
<voice 02442_00003464><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>但要是比師傅更了不起的賢者大人
說那裡可以開挖，
大家應該都會聽從吧？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3465.en:
<voice 02522_00003465><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>That's why, <pc>. Why I want you to start
working as my servant right away.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3465.ja:
<voice 02522_00003465><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「そういうワケで　<pc>。
　あたしの下僕として　さっそく
　はたらいてもらいたいの。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3465.ko:
<voice 02522_00003465><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 그런 관계로, <pc>.
　내 부하로서 바로
　일을 하나 해 줘야겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3465.zh-Hans:
<voice 02522_00003465><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>所以，<pc>，
我希望你身为我的仆人，
赶快行动。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3465.zh-Hant:
<voice 02522_00003465><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>所以，<pc>，
我希望你身為我的僕人，
趕快行動。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3466.en:
<voice 02621_00003466><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Living in Acronia Mine is Sage Broggen. We've got to
convince him to give us the thumbs up to dig there!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3466.ja:
<voice 02621_00003466><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「アクロニア鉱山に住む　賢者ブロッゲン。
　あいつを説得して　その場所を掘ってもいいって
　おスミつきを　もらってくるのよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3466.ko:
<voice 02621_00003466><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 아크로니아 광산에 사는 현자 브록겐.
　그 녀석을 설득해서 거길 파도 좋다는
　허락을 받아 와!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3466.zh-Hans:
<voice 02621_00003466><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>贤者布罗根住在阿库洛尼亚矿山。
你去说服那家伙，让他表示可以
开挖那个地方！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3466.zh-Hant:
<voice 02621_00003466><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>賢者布羅根住在阿庫洛尼亞礦山。
你去說服那傢伙，讓他表示可以
開挖那個地方！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3467.en:
<voice 02681_00003467><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>It's a bit of a tricky job, but if you pull it off, I'll give you
my ZOOMSTONE!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3467.ja:
<voice 02681_00003467><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ちょっぴり　むずかしい仕事だけど
　もし成功したら　あたしのルーラストーンを
　あげてもいいわッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3467.ko:
<voice 02681_00003467><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 조금 까다로운 일이긴 하지만
　만약 성공한다면
　내 루라 스톤을 줄 수도 있어!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3467.zh-Hans:
<voice 02681_00003467><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>这是个有点困难的工作，
但你要是成功了，我可以把我的
鲁拉之石给你！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3467.zh-Hant:
<voice 02681_00003467><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>這是個有點困難的工作，
但你要是成功了，我可以把我的
魯拉石給你！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3468.en:
<voice 02741_00003468><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>With a Zoomstone, you can go to any place you've
recorded in the stone instaaantly. Everyone wants one
of these precious things for some reason!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3468.ja:
<voice 02741_00003468><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ルーラストーンがあれば
　石に記憶させた場所に　一瞬で行けるのよ。
　誰もが欲しがる　貴重なものなんだから！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3468.ko:
<voice 02741_00003468><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 루라 스톤이 있으면

3496.zh-Hant: <voice 02292_00003496><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>唔呵呵～～不告訴你～～♪<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3497.ja: <voice 02364_00003497><start_lip_sync n00388 _normal m00001>「……は　はあ。<stop_lip_animation n00388 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3498.en: <voice 02437_00003498><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>By the by, <pc>. What is your story?<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3498.ja:
<voice 02437_00003498><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ところでさ　<pc>。
　話って　なんなの？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3498.ko:
<voice 02437_00003498><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 그런데, <pc>.
　할 얘기란 게 뭐냐?<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3498.zh-Hans:
<voice 02437_00003498><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>对了，<pc>，
你要说什么？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3498.zh-Hant:
<voice 02437_00003498><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>對了，<pc>，
你要說什麼？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3500.en:
<voice 02529_00003500><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>...Miss Lunana, eh. I know her, I know her! She is
Father Holta's daughter, is she not!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3500.ja:
<voice 02529_00003500><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「……ルナナおじょうさんね。
　知ってる　知ってる！
　あの　ホルタ神父の娘だね！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3500.ko:
<voice 02529_00003500><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: ……루나나 아가씨라.
　알아, 알아!
　홀터 신부의 딸 맞지!?<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3500.zh-Hans:
<voice 02529_00003500><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……是露娜娜小姐啊。
我知道、我知道！
是那个霍尔达神父的女儿！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3500.zh-Hant:
<voice 02529_00003500><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……露娜娜小姐啊。
我知道、我知道！
是那個霍爾達神父的女兒！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3501.en:
<voice 02577_00003501><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>...I see, I see. Certainly, everyone in Agrani heeds
Master Broggen's advice, they dooo.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3501.ja:
<voice 02577_00003501><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「……なるほど　なるほど。確かに
　ブロッゲンさまの言うことを　聞かないヤツは
　アグラニには　いないからね～。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3501.ko:
<voice 02577_00003501><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: ……그렇군. 하긴
　브록겐 님의 말을 거역할 녀석은
　아그라니에는 없을 테니까~<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3501.zh-Hans:
<voice 02577_00003501><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……原来如此、原来如此。的确，
在阿古拉尼，没有人不听从
布罗根大人说的话～～<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3501.zh-Hant:
<voice 02577_00003501><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……原來如此、原來如此。的確，
在阿古拉尼，沒有人不聽從
布羅根大人說的話～～<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3502.ja: <voice 02655_00003502><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>「ぐう　ぐう……。<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3502.ko: <voice 02655_00003502><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>: 쿨…… 쿨…….<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3503.en: <voice 02685_00003503><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Uh-huh... These are master Broggen's wooords!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3503.ja:
<voice 02685_00003503><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ふむふむ……。
　ブロッゲンさまは　こう　おっしゃって
　おらレール！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3503.ko:
<voice 02685_00003503><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 흠흠…….
　브록겐 님은 이렇게 말씀하고
　계시니~라!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3503.zh-Hans:
<voice 02685_00003503><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>嗯嗯嗯……
布罗根大人
是这么说的！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3503.zh-Hant:
<voice 02685_00003503><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>嗯嗯嗯……
布羅根大人
是這麼說的！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3504.en:
<voice 02798_00003504><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>The land mentioned in Lunana's book is the place the
miners call the "Caution Land"...<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3504.ja:
<voice 02798_00003504><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ルナナの言う　書物に記された地とは
　アクロニア鉱山で　はたらく者たちが
　戒めの地と呼ぶ場所であり……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3504.ko:
<voice 02798_00003504><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 루나나가 말한 책에 기록된 땅은
　아크로니아 광산에서 일하는 자들이
　교훈의 땅이라 부르는 곳으로……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3504.zh-Hans:
<voice 02798_00003504><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>露娜娜所说的书籍中记载之地，
是在阿库洛尼亚矿山工作的人们
称为禁锢之地的场所……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3504.zh-Hant:
<voice 02798_00003504><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>露娜娜所說的書籍記載之地，
是在阿庫洛尼亞礦山工作的人們
稱為禁錮之地的地方……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3505.en:
<voice 02898_00003505><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Long ago, a terrible incident occurred when greedy
dwarves took one another's lives over a precious jewel
that was found in that laaand!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3505.ja:
<voice 02898_00003505><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「はるか昔　あの地に眠る　貴重な宝石をめぐり
　強欲なドワーフたちが　命を奪い合うという
　忌まわしい事件が　起きた場所なのでアール！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3505.ko:
<voice 02898_00003505><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 먼 옛날, 그 땅에 있는 귀한 보석을 둘러싸고
　탐욕스러운 드워프들이 서로를 죽고 죽이는
　처참한 사건이 일어났던 곳이니~라!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3505.zh-Hans:
<voice 02898_00003505><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>很久以前，那里曾发生可怕的事件，
贪心的多瓦夫们互相厮杀，
为了霸占沉眠于该地的贵重宝石是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3505.zh-Hant:
<voice 02898_00003505><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>很久以前，那裡曾發生可怕的事件，
為了霸占沉眠於該地的貴重寶石，
貪心的多瓦夫們互相廝殺是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3506.en:
<voice 02957_00003506><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>And so, after the Dwarves' deaths, their lingering
avarice transformed them into Grudges, keeping those
away who would enter the mine.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3506.ja:
<voice 02957_00003506><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「そして　その場にいたドワーフたちは　死後
　欲と未練にまみれた怨霊となり　鉱山に入る者を
　退けるようになってしまったのさ。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3506.ko:
<voice 02957_00003506><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 그리고 그 자리에 있던 드워프들은 사후
　욕심과 미련만 남은 원령이 되어
　광산에 들어오는 자들을 쫓아내게 되었다.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3506.zh-Hans:
<voice 02957_00003506><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>在那里的多瓦夫们，死后化为
充满欲望与留恋的怨灵，
并且会赶走进入矿山的人。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3506.zh-Hant:
<voice 02957_00003506><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>在那裡的多瓦夫們，死後化為
充滿慾望與留戀的怨靈，
並且會趕走進入礦山的人。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26749.en:
<voice 03047_00026749><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>...So, Agrani's people swore to Mountain God Yppchal
that they would treat that incident as a cautionary tale,
and continued praying to soothe the grudges.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26749.ja:
<voice 03047_00026749><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「……そこで　アグラニの人たちは
　山神イプチャルに　その事件を戒めにすると誓い
　怨霊を鎮めてほしいと　祈りつづけたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26749.ko:
<voice 03047_00026749><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: ……그래서 아그라니 사람들은 산신 이프찰께
　그 사건을 교훈으로 삼을 것을 맹세하며
　원령을 잠재워 달라고 기도했지.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26749.zh-Hans:
<voice 03047_00026749><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……因此，阿古拉尼的人们
就发誓要吸取那个事件的教训，
祈求山神伊普查尔让怨灵平息下来。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26749.zh-Hant:
<voice 03047_00026749><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……因此，阿古拉尼的人們
就發誓要記取那個事件的教訓，
祈求山神伊普查爾讓怨靈平息下來。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3507.en:
<voice 03089_00003507><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Those prayers were answered, and at last, the grudges
were laid to rest. The bosses know of this story, and
that is why they don't dig in the Caution Land anymore...<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3507.ja:
<voice 03089_00003507><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「その祈りが届き　怨霊は　ついに鎮められた。
　親方たちは　その話を知っているから
　戒めの地だけは　掘らないってわけさ……。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3507.ko:
<voice 03089_00003507><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 그 기도가 닿아 마침내 원령이 봉인됐지만
　감독님은 그 이야기를 아니까
　교훈의 땅만은 파지 않았던 거다…….<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3507.zh-Hans:
<voice 03089_00003507><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>当祈祷生效后，怨灵就被镇压了。
老大他们知道这件事，
所以才会说不要挖掘禁锢之地……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3507.zh-Hant:
<voice 03089_00003507><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>當祈禱生效後，怨靈總算被鎮壓住了。
師傅他們知道這件事，
才會說不要挖掘禁錮之地……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3508.ja: <voice 03165_00003508><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>「ぐう　ぐう……。<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3508.ko: <voice 03165_00003508><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>: 쿨…… 쿨…….<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3511.en:
<voice 03251_00003511><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Master Broggen said that he himself will go explain
to Lunana the situation regarding the Caution Laaand...<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3511.ja:
<voice 03251_00003511><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさまは　自分が行って
　ルナナに　戒めの地の説明をしてやろうと
　おっしゃっておらレール……。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3511.ko:
<voice 03251_00003511><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님이 본인이 직접 가서
　루나나에게 교훈의 땅에 관해
　설명해 주겠다고 하신다…….<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3511.zh-Hans:
<voice 03251_00003511><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布罗根大人说要亲自去跟
露娜娜说明
禁锢之地的事……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3511.zh-Hant:
<voice 03251_00003511><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布羅根大人說，
他要親自去跟露娜娜說明
禁錮之地的事……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3512.en:
<voice 03327_00003512><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001><pc> is to accompany us, to see matters
through... So says heee.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3512.ja:
<voice 03327_00003512><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「<pc>は　しっかりと見届けよ……
　とのことでアール。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3512.ko:
<voice 03327_00003512><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: {pc}|hpp(은,는) 똑똑히 지켜봐라……
　라고 하셨느니~라.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3512.zh-Hans:
<voice 03327_00003512><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>还说……
<pc>你要好好看着是也。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3512.zh-Hant:
<voice 03327_00003512><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>還說……
<pc>你要好好看著是也。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3513.en: <voice 03488_00003513><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Master Broggen, please be careful with meee!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3513.ja:
<voice 03488_00003513><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさま　くれっぐれも
　お手柔らかに　お願いしますよ～！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3513.ko:
<voice 03488_00003513><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님, 부탁이니
　너무 성질부리시면 안 됩니다~!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3513.zh-Hans:
<voice 03488_00003513><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布罗根大人，请您
务必多加斟酌啊～～！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3513.zh-Hant:
<voice 03488_00003513><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布羅根大人，請您
務必多加斟酌啊～～！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3514.en: <voice 03597_00003514><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>I'm just an interpreter, remember? Please don't break me!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3514.ja:
<voice 03597_00003514><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ボクは　ただの通訳なんですからね？
　へし折られたりとか　イヤですよっ！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3514.ko:
<voice 03597_00003514><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 전 그냥 통역일 뿐이라고요?
　행여나 부러뜨리시면 안 됩니다!?<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3514.zh-Hans:
<voice 03597_00003514><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>我只是个传话的而已！
我可不想被折断！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3514.zh-Hant:
<voice 03597_00003514><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>我只是個翻譯而已！
我可不想被折斷喔！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3515.en: <voice 00229_00003515><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>SHUT UP, WHISKERS! I'M SICK OF YOUR LECTURES!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3515.ja:
<voice 00229_00003515><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「うるさい　ヒゲッ！
　お説教なんて　もうウンザリ！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3515.ko:
<voice 00229_00003515><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 시끄러워, 수염 영감!
　잔소리는 이제 지긋지긋해!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3515.zh-Hans:
<voice 00229_00003515><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>吵死了，胡子！
我不想听人说教！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3515.zh-Hant:
<voice 00229_00003515><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>吵死了，鬍子！
我不想聽人說教！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3516.en: <voice 00372_00003516><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>You... MOLDY DUMPLING!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3516.ja: <voice 00372_00003516><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「この……ッ　カビだんごッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3516.ko: <voice 00372_00003516><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 이…… 곰팡이 찹쌀떡 같으니!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3516.zh-Hans: <voice 00372_00003516><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>这个……发霉的团子！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3516.zh-Hant: <voice 00372_00003516><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>這個……發霉的糰子！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3517.en:
<voice 00409_00003517><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>I'm not giving you the Zoomstone because you couldn't
convince Broggen to help me! You're fired! FIRED!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3517.ja:
<voice 00409_00003517><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンを　説得できなかったんだから
　ルーラストーンは　あげないわよ！
　下僕も　クビよ　クビっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3517.ko:
<voice 00409_00003517><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 브록겐을 설득하지 못했으니
　루라 스톤은 못 줘!
　내 부하에서도 해고야, 해고!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3517.zh-Hans:
<voice 00409_00003517><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>因为你没说服布罗根，
所以我不给你鲁拉之石！
也开除你仆人职务了！开除！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3517.zh-Hant:
<voice 00409_00003517><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>因為你沒說服布羅根，
所以我不給你魯拉石！
也開除你僕人職務了！開除！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3519.en: <voice 00629_00003519><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Awawawa... She is scaaaaary.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3519.ja: <voice 00629_00003519><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「あわわわ……　こわ～い。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3519.ko: <voice 00629_00003519><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 세상에…… 무서워~라.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3519.zh-Hans: <voice 00629_00003519><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>啊哇哇哇……好可怕。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3519.zh-Hant: <voice 00629_00003519><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>啊哇哇哇……好可怕。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3520.en:
<voice 00719_00003520><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>But regardless of how angry she gets, that young lady

<voice 00719_00003520><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>可是，不管多生气，

3526.en:
<voice 00999_00003526><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001><pc>, if you'd be willing to accompany us on a

3526.ja:
<voice 00999_00003526><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「<pc>が　我々と　一緒に

3526.ko:
<voice 00999_00003526><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: <pc> 네가 우리와 함께

3527.en:
<voice 01079_00003527><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>He'll even give you a Zoomstone since Lunana wouldn't
give you hers!... *Sniff, hic* Such compassionate words.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3527.ja:
<voice 01079_00003527><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ルナナに　もらいそびれたルーラストーンを
　<pc>に　やろうと！
　……くううっ　なんと　慈悲深いお言葉。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3527.ko:
<voice 01079_00003527><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 루나나에게 받지 못한 루라 스톤을
　<pc> 네게 주신다는군!
　……크으으, 이렇게 자비로우실 데가.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3527.zh-Hans:
<voice 01079_00003527><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>那我们就给<pc>
没能从露娜娜那边拿到的鲁拉之石！
……唔，这是多么慈悲的胸怀啊。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3527.zh-Hant:
<voice 01079_00003527><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>那我們就給<pc>
沒能從露娜娜那邊拿到的魯拉石！
……唔，這是多麼慈悲的胸懷啊。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3528.en:
<voice 01154_00003528><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Well, that aside, <pc>, you will assist Master
Broggen, won't you!?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3528.ja:
<voice 01154_00003528><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「まあ　それはさておき　<pc>。
　ブロッゲンさまの手伝い　してくれるよね！？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3528.ko:
<voice 01154_00003528><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 뭐 그건 그렇고, <pc>.
　브록겐 님을 도와드릴 거지!?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3528.zh-Hans:
<voice 01154_00003528><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>好了，先不说这些，<pc>。
你愿意帮布罗根大人的忙吧？！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3528.zh-Hant:
<voice 01154_00003528><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>好了，先不說這些，<pc>。
你願意幫布羅根大人的忙吧！？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3529.en: <voice 01209_00003529><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>DON'T YOU DARE REFUSE!!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3529.ja: <voice 01209_00003529><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「いいえ　とか　言うなっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3529.ko: <voice 01209_00003529><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 여기서 싫다고 하면 안 되지!!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3529.zh-Hans: <voice 01209_00003529><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>不要说不行啊！！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3529.zh-Hant: <voice 01209_00003529><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>不要說不行啊！！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3530.en:
<voice 01434_00003530><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>You would say that to Master Broggen, who has been so
thoughtful, and even offered you a Zoomstone? You
will assist, won't yooou!?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3530.ja:
<voice 01434_00003530><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさまが　気をつかって
　ルーラストーンをくれるって言ってるんだぞ？
　手伝うに　決まってるよねっ！？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3530.ko:
<voice 01434_00003530><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님이 기껏 널 생각해서
　루라 스톤을 주겠다고 하시는데!
　당연히 도와드려야 하지 않겠냐!?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3530.zh-Hans:
<voice 01434_00003530><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布罗根大人顾虑你，
才特地说要给你鲁拉之石的！
当然应该要帮忙吧？！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3530.zh-Hant:
<voice 01434_00003530><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布羅根大人顧慮你，
才特地說要給你魯拉石的喔！
當然應該要幫忙吧！？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3531.en:
<voice 01274_00003531><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Then, before anything else, Master Broggen will give
you the Zoomstooone!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3531.ja:
<voice 01274_00003531><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさまが　先に　ルーラストーンを
　くださるそうでアール！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3531.ko:
<voice 01274_00003531><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님께서 루라 스톤 먼저
　주겠다고 하신~다!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3531.zh-Hans:
<voice 01274_00003531><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布罗根大人说要先给你
鲁拉之石是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3531.zh-Hant:
<voice 01274_00003531><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布羅根大人說要先給你
魯拉石是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3532.ja: <voice 01339_00003532><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>「ぐう　ぐう……。<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3532.ko: <voice 01339_00003532><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>: 쿨…… 쿨…….<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001515.ja:
<pc>は
ルーラストーンを　手に入れた！<me 61>

39087.en:
The Zoomstone is a magic stone that allows you to
travel to any location recorded on it. It will not
disappear no matter how many times you use it.
39087.ja:
ルーラストーンは　記憶させた場所に
一瞬で移動できる　魔法の石です。
何度使っても　なくなりません。
39087.ko:
루라 스톤은 등록한 장소로
단숨에 이동할 수 있는 마법의 돌입니다.
여러 번 사용해도 없어지지 않습니다.
39087.zh-Hans:
鲁拉之石是魔法之石，
可以瞬间让你移动到它记录的地点。
反复使用也不会消失。
39087.zh-Hant:
魯拉石是魔法之石，
可以瞬間讓你移動到它記錄的地點。
反覆使用也不會消失。

19000571.en: The town of Agrani is now recorded in the Zoomstone.
19000571.ja:
このルーラストーンには
アグラニの町が　記憶されています。
19000571.ko:
이 루라 스톤에는
아그라니 마을이 새겨져 있습니다.
19000571.zh-Hans:
这块鲁拉之石
记录着阿古拉尼镇。
19000571.zh-Hant:
這塊魯拉石
記錄著阿古拉尼鎮。

19000572.en:
In addition to new towns that you visit you may record
additional locations by searching for stone monuments
throughout the world.
19000572.ja:
冒険で訪れた場所が　記憶されるほか　
各地にある　いざないの石碑を　しらべることで
そこを　行き先として　記憶させられます。
19000572.ko:
모험에서 방문한 장소가 새겨질 뿐 아니라
각지에 있는 이끌림의 비석을 조사하면
그곳을 목적지로 등록할 수 있습니다.
19000572.zh-Hans:
除了会记录在冒险中探访过的地点以外，
在调查各地的引路石碑后，
更可将其记录为目的地。
19000572.zh-Hant:
除了會記錄在冒險中探訪過的地點以外，
在調查各地的引路石碑後，
更可將其記錄為目的地。

3534.en:
<voice 01524_00003534><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Don't just take the reward and vamoose! Once you are
prepared, proceed directly to Boss Hottsi's house!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3534.ja:
<voice 01524_00003534><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「報酬だけもらって　逃げちゃダメだよ！
　準備を整えたら　まっすぐ
　ホッツィ親方の家まで　来てよねっ！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3534.ko:
<voice 01524_00003534><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 보수만 받고 내빼면 안 된다!?
　준비가 끝나면 바로
　홋찌 감독의 집으로 와!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3534.zh-Hans:
<voice 01524_00003534><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>你可不能拿了酬劳就跑！
做好准备后，立刻
来霍崔老大的家！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3534.zh-Hant:
<voice 01524_00003534><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>你可不能拿了報酬就跑喔！
做好準備就立刻來霍崔師傅家！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3535.en:
<voice 00025_00003535><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Still, that damned Lunana! How dare she act like that
to the Great Sage Broggen!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3535.ja:
<voice 00025_00003535><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「しかし　ルナナのヤツめ。
　偉大なる賢者　ブロッゲンさまにまで
　そんな態度を取るとは　ふてえヤツだ！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3535.ko:
<voice 00025_00003535><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 그나저나 루나나 그 녀석.
　위대한 현자 브록겐 님께까지
　그런 태도라니 버르장머리가 글러 먹었군!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3535.zh-Hans:
<voice 00025_00003535><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>可是露娜娜那家伙，
竟敢用那种态度面对伟大贤者
布罗根大人，真是岂有此理！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3535.zh-Hant:
<voice 00025_00003535><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>可是露娜娜那傢伙，
竟敢用那種態度面對偉大賢者
布羅根大人，真是豈有此理！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3536.en:
<voice 00050_00003536><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>If she got fed up, and left this town altogether, I'd be
relieved......<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3536.ja:
<voice 00050_00003536><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「いっそ　怒りにまかせて
　この町から　出ていってくれれば
　せいせいするんだがなぁ……。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3536.ko:
<voice 00050_00003536><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 차라리 분에 못 이겨
　이대로 이 마을을 떠나 주면
　속이 시원할 텐데…….<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3536.zh-Hans:
<voice 00050_00003536><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>她干脆气到
直接离开这个城镇，
我还比较清闲咧……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3536.zh-Hant:
<voice 00050_00003536><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>她乾脆氣到
直接離開這個市鎮，
我還比較清閒咧……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3537.en:
<voice 00090_00003537><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Indeed! She is vastly different than her father, Father
Holta, was, is she not!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3537.ja:
<voice 00090_00003537><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「まったくだよ！
　お父さんのホルタ神父とは　大ちがいだね！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3537.ko:
<voice 00090_00003537><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 내 말이!
　아버지인 홀터 신부와는 딴판이야!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3537.zh-Hans:
<voice 00090_00003537><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>就是说啊！
跟她爸爸霍尔达神父实在差太多了！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3537.zh-Hant:
<voice 00090_00003537><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>就是說啊！
跟她爸爸霍爾達神父實在差太多了！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3539.ja: <voice 00250_00003539><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「遅かったじゃないか！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3539.ko: <voice 00250_00003539><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 왜 이리 늦었어!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3540.en: <voice 00322_00003540><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Master Broggen, are you ready to go?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3540.ja:
<voice 00322_00003540><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさま。
　もう　出発なさるんですか？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3540.ko:
<voice 00322_00003540><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님.
　벌써 출발하시려고요?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3540.zh-Hans:
<voice 00322_00003540><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>布罗根大人，
要出发了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3540.zh-Hant:
<voice 00322_00003540><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>布羅根大人，
要出發了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3541.ja: <voice 00370_00003541><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>「ぐう　ぐう……。<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3541.ko: <voice 00370_00003541><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>: 쿨…… 쿨…….<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3542.en:
<voice 00420_00003542><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>These are Master Broggen's words!
"Even before the collapse, there was something a bit
strange going on in Acronia Mine!"<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3542.ja:
<voice 00420_00003542><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさまは　おっしゃっておらレール！
　崩落の前から　アクロニア鉱山の様子は
　すこし　おかしかった。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3542.ko:
<voice 00420_00003542><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님은 이렇게 말씀하고 계시니~라!
　붕괴 사고 전부터 아크로니아 광산이
　조금 이상했다.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3542.zh-Hans:
<voice 00420_00003542><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布罗根大人说！
在崩塌之前，阿库洛尼亚矿山的样子
就有点奇怪了。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3542.zh-Hant:
<voice 00420_00003542><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布羅根大人說！
在崩塌之前，阿庫洛尼亞礦山的樣子
就有點奇怪了。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3543.en:
<voice 00445_00003543><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>"For miasma to have even appeared in Mountain God
Yppchal's mountain, the situation is dire indeed. We
must investigate immediately"... So say heee.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3543.ja:

3560.en:
<voice 00345_00003560><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>That idiot Boss and the others believe in silly

3564.en:
<voice 00475_00003564><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00006>Lunana! Don't trample upon the Dwaaarven code!
Your father never acted like thiiis!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00475_00003564><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00006>「ルナナ！　ドワーフの掟を
　土足で踏みにじっては　ダメでアール！
　お前の父親は　そんな人じゃなかったでアール！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00475_00003564><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00006>: 루나나! 드워프의 금기를
　함부로 깨서는 안 되느니~라!
　네 아버지는 그런 사람이 아니었느니~라!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3564.zh-Hans:
<voice 00475_00003564><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00006>露娜娜！不可以这样践踏
多瓦夫的规矩！
你的父亲可不是这样的人是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00475_00003564><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00006>露娜娜！

3565.zh-Hans: <voice 00544_00003565><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>闭嘴！！臭棍子！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3566.en:
<voice 00645_00003566><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>You... My father always sucked up to people like you...
He was too soft-hearted!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00645_00003566><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>「あんな……　人に　こびるような

<voice 00645_00003566><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>: 그딴…… 남들 비위나 맞추는

實在太弱了！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3567.en:
<voice 00675_00003567><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>I'll show you how wrong you were to believe in super-
stition, and seal this land off; then the people of Agrani
will submit to me!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3567.ja:
<voice 00675_00003567><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>「あたしは　迷信を真に受けて　この地を封じた
　アンタたちが　間違っていたことを証明し
　アグラニの住人を　服従させてみせる！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3567.ko:
<voice 00675_00003567><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>: 난 미신을 믿고 이 땅을 봉인한
　당신들이 틀렸다는 걸 증명해서
　아그라니 사람들을 복종시키고 말 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3567.zh-Hans:
<voice 00675_00003567><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>我要向被迷信摆布的你们
证明封锁这片土地是错的，
让阿古拉尼的居民都听命于我！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3567.zh-Hant:
<voice 00675_00003567><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>我要向被迷信擺布的你們
證明封鎖這片土地是錯的，
讓阿古拉尼的居民都聽命於我！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3568.en:
<voice 00705_00003568><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>THEN, with Agrani as my base, I'll make the whole
world kneel before MEEE!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3568.ja:
<voice 00705_00003568><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>「そして　このアグラニを拠点とし　いずれ
　世界中の人々を　ひざまずかせてやるのよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3568.ko:
<voice 00705_00003568><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>: 그리고 아그라니를 거점으로
　언젠가 온 세상 사람들을
　내 발밑에 엎드리게 만들겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3568.zh-Hans:
<voice 00705_00003568><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>然后我要以阿古拉尼为据点，
让全世界的人都跪在我面前！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3568.zh-Hant:
<voice 00705_00003568><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>然後我要以阿古拉尼為據點，
讓全世界的人都跪在我面前！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3569.en: <voice 00765_00003569><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>Lunana... You rotten...!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00765_00003569><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>「ルナナ……。
　お前ってヤツは……！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3569.ko:
<voice 00765_00003569><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>: 루나나…….
　너란 녀석은……!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3569.zh-Hans:
<voice 00765_00003569><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>露娜娜……
你这家伙……！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3569.zh-Hant:
<voice 00765_00003569><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>露娜娜……
妳這傢伙……！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3570.en:
<voice 00795_00003570><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>So greeeat! We're definitely gettin' outta here wit'
somethin' incredible!!<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00795_00003570><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>「すげえええ！
　こりゃあ　絶対　とんでもないもんが出るぞ！！<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3570.ko:
<voice 00795_00003570><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>: 끝내주는데!
　이거, 엄청난 보석이 나오겠어!!<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3570.zh-Hans:
<voice 00795_00003570><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>太棒了！
这下里面绝对有很不得了的东西！！<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3570.zh-Hant:
<voice 00795_00003570><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>太棒了！
這下裡面絕對有很不得了東西！！<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3571.en: <voice 00810_00003571><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>YEAH! I can almost smell it!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3571.ja: <voice 00810_00003571><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>「ああ！　そんなニオイがするなぁ！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3571.ko: <voice 00810_00003571><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>: 그러게! 느낌이 팍팍 와!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3571.zh-Hans: <voice 00810_00003571><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>是啊！感觉得出来！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3571.zh-Hant: <voice 00810_00003571><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>對啊！感覺得出來！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3572.en:
<voice 00826_00003572><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>Stop it, Mutch, Butch! If you dig any deeper, you'll
only be sorry!!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3572.ja:
<voice 00826_00003572><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>「やめるんだ　ムチェ　ブチャ！
　それ以上　掘れば　タダではすまんぞっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3572.ko:
<voice 00826_00003572><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>: 그만해라! 무체, 부차!
　더 팠다가는 큰일이 일어날 거다!!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3572.zh-Hans:
<voice 00826_00003572><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>快住手，姆切、布切！
再挖下去就要出事了！！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3572.zh-Hant:
<voice 00826_00003572><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>快住手，穆切、布查！
再挖下去就要出事了！！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3573.en:
<voice 00880_00003573><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>SHUT IT! How dare you... Hidin' such a great place
like this for so long!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3573.ja:
<voice 00880_00003573><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>「うるせえっ！
　よくも……　こんないい場所があることを
　ずっと　隠してやがったな！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3573.ko:
<voice 00880_00003573><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>: 시끄러워!
　이런 좋은 곳이 있다는 걸……
　지금까지 감추고 있었다니!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3573.zh-Hans:
<voice 00880_00003573><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>吵死了！
明明有这么棒的地方，
你居然一直瞒着我们！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3573.zh-Hant:
<voice 00880_00003573><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>吵死了！
明明有這麼棒的地方，
你居然一直瞞著我們！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3574.en:
<voice 00930_00003574><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>We won't let you keep it all to yourself! This here's
ours!!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3574.ja:
<voice 00930_00003574><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>「ひとりじめには　させねえぜ！
　ここは　オレたちのもんだっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3574.ko:
<voice 00930_00003574><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>: 당신 혼자 차지하게 놔둘 것 같아!?
　여긴 우리 거야!!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3574.zh-Hans:
<voice 00930_00003574><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>别想一个人独占！
这里现在归我们了！！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3574.zh-Hant:
<voice 00930_00003574><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>別想一個人獨占！
這裡現在歸我們了！！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3575.en:
<voice 01001_00003575><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>Don't think like that! This is the place where the
Mountain God appeases the souls of those who were
consumed by greed!!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3575.ja:
<voice 01001_00003575><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>「そんな考え方をしては　いかん！
　ここは　山神さまが　欲にとりつかれた魂を
　鎮めてくださっている場所なんだ！！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3575.ko:
<voice 01001_00003575><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>: 그렇게 생각하면 안 돼!
　이곳은 산신님이 욕심에 눈먼 영혼을
　잠재우신 곳이란 말이다!!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3575.zh-Hans:
<voice 01001_00003575><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>你们不可以有这种想法！
这里是山神大人
镇压贪婪之魂的地方！！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3575.zh-Hant:
<voice 01001_00003575><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>你們不可以有這種想法！
這裡是山神大人
鎮壓貪婪之魂的地方！！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3576.en:
<voice 01071_00003576><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>We all swore to the Mountain God that we would not
repeat our history of fighting out of avarice!!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3576.ja:
<voice 01071_00003576><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>「行きすぎた欲望のために争い
　滅びをむかえる歴史は　くり返さないと
　オレたちは　山神さまに誓ったんだ！！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3576.ko:
<voice 01071_00003576><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>: 우리는 도 넘은 욕심 때문에 싸우다
　멸망을 초래하는 역사를 다시는
　되풀이하지 않겠다고 산신님께 맹세했다!!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3576.zh-Hans:
<voice 01071_00003576><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>我们对山神大人发过誓，
绝对不会再让无止尽的欲望
引发纷争和毁灭！！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3576.zh-Hant:
<voice 01071_00003576><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>我們對山神大人發過誓，
絕對不會再讓無止盡的慾望
引發紛爭和毀滅！！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3577.en:
<voice 01115_00003577><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>AIN'T NO SUCH THING AS THE MOUNTAIN GOD!
THIS PLACE IS MINE!!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01115_00003577><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>「山神なんざ　いるもんか！
　ここは　オレのもんだぁ！！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3577.ko:
<voice 01115_00003577><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>: 산신이 어디 있다는 거야!
　여긴 내 거야!!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3577.zh-Hans:
<voice 01115_00003577><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>怎么可能有什么山神嘛！

3577.zh-Hant:
<voice 01115_00003577><start_lip_sync n00392 _normal m00006>怎麼可能有什麼山神嘛！
這個地方屬於我了！<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3578.en: <voice 01160_00003578><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>No, it's MIIINE!!<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3578.ja: <voice 01160_00003578><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>「いや　オレのもんだああ！！<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3578.ko: <voice 01160_00003578><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>: 아냐, 내 거야!!<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3578.zh-Hans: <voice 01160_00003578><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>才不是，这里是我的！！<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3578.zh-Hant: <voice 01160_00003578><start_lip_sync n00393 _normal m00006>才不是，這裡是我的！！<stop_lip_animation n00393 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3579.ko: <voice 01205_00003579><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>: 자…… 잠깐!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3579.zh-Hans: <voice 01205_00003579><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>等……等一下！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3579.zh-Hant: <voice 01205_00003579><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>等……等一下！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3580.ja: <voice 01297_00003580><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>「ウ　ガガガ………！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3580.ko: <voice 01297_00003580><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>: 끄, 끄아아………!<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3580.zh-Hant: <voice 01297_00003580><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>唔、啊啊啊……！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3581.en: <voice 01330_00003581><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>W-what the? What was that voice just now...!?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3581.ja: <voice 01330_00003581><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>「な　なんなの？　今の声は……！？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3581.ko: <voice 01330_00003581><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>: 뭐, 뭐야? 방금 그 목소리……!?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3581.zh-Hans: <voice 01330_00003581><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>那、那是什么声音……？！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3581.zh-Hant: <voice 01330_00003581><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00006>那、那是什麼聲音……！？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3582.ja: <voice 01375_00003582><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>「マアモォォオオオン！！！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3583.en: <voice 01580_00003583><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00006>KYAAAH! I-IS THIS WHAT YOU'D CALL A GHOST!?<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3583.ja:
<voice 01580_00003583><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00006>「キャー！

<voice 01580_00003583><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00006>: 끄악~!
