<voice 01580_00003583><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00006>哇！
那、那就是怨靈嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3586.en: <voice 01728_00003586><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>My name is Mammon......<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3586.ja: <voice 01728_00003586><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>「我が名は　マアモン……。<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3586.ko: <voice 01728_00003586><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>: 내 이름은 마몬…….<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3586.zh-Hans: <voice 01728_00003586><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>我的名字是玛蒙……<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3586.zh-Hant: <voice 01728_00003586><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>我的名字是瑪蒙……<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3587.en:
<voice 01763_00003587><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>Greedy insects... No one shall have the jewels that lie
in this land...!<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3587.ja:
<voice 01763_00003587><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>「欲深き者どもめ……。
　この地に眠る宝石は　誰にも渡さぬ……！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3587.ko:
<voice 01763_00003587><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>: 탐욕스러운 놈들 같으니…….
　이 땅의 보석은 아무에게도 줄 수 없다……!<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3587.zh-Hans:
<voice 01763_00003587><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>贪婪的人们啊……
休想把长眠于此的宝石带走……！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3587.zh-Hant:
<voice 01763_00003587><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>貪婪的人們啊……
休想把長眠於此的寶石帶走……！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3589.en:
<voice 01849_00003589><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>I'll eat your souls, so that you'll never set foot in this
place agaaaaain!<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3589.ja:
<voice 01849_00003589><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>「二度と足を踏み入れられぬよう
　魂ごと　喰らってくれるわァァァ！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3589.ko:
<voice 01849_00003589><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>: 다시는 이곳에 발을 들일 수 없도록
　영혼까지 집어삼켜 주마!<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3589.zh-Hans:
<voice 01849_00003589><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>我会把你们的灵魂啃食殆尽，
不会让你们再次踏入此地！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3589.zh-Hant:
<voice 01849_00003589><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>我會把你們的靈魂啃食殆盡，
不再讓你們踏入此地了！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3590.ja: <voice 01930_00003590><start_lip_sync m50022 _normal m00006>「ギシャァァアアアアアアアアアア！！！<stop_lip_animation m50022 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3591.en: <voice 02033_00003591><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>H-he's...sucking out... all the strength... in my body...<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3591.ja:
<voice 02033_00003591><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>「か　身体に……チカラが　入らねえ………。
　あいつに……吸い取られる……。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3591.ko:
<voice 02033_00003591><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>: 모, 몸에…… 힘이 안 들어가……….
　저 녀석이…… 흡수하고 있어…….<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3591.zh-Hans:
<voice 02033_00003591><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>身、身体完全使不上力……
力量……要被那家伙吸走了……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3591.zh-Hant:
<voice 02033_00003591><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00006>身、身體完全使不上力……
力量……要被那傢伙吸走了……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

You have done well saving precious lives from Mammon...
3621.ja:
<voice 05930_00003621><center>勇気ある　ドワーフたちよ　礼を言おう。
よくぞ　マアモンより
尊い命を　守ってくれた……。
3621.ko:
<voice 05930_00003621><center>용기 있는 드워프들이여, 고맙다.
마몬으로부터 소중한 목숨을
지키다니 훌륭하도다…….
3621.zh-Hans:
<voice 05930_00003621><center>勇敢的多瓦夫啊，谢谢你们。
谢谢你们从玛蒙的魔掌中
拯救了宝贵的生命……
3621.zh-Hant:
<voice 05930_00003621><center>勇敢的多瓦夫啊，謝謝你們。
謝謝你們從瑪蒙的魔掌中
拯救了寶貴的生命……

3624.en: <voice 06153_00003624><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>That voice is...?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3624.ja: <voice 06153_00003624><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「この声は……？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3624.ko: <voice 06153_00003624><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 이 목소리는……?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3624.zh-Hans: <voice 06153_00003624><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>这声音是……？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3624.zh-Hant: <voice 06153_00003624><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>這聲音是……？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3622.en:
<voice 06233_00003622><center>The demon miasma that swirls in this land...
Has drained my power, so I have been unable
to contain Mammon or bless the mines.
3622.ja:
<voice 06233_00003622><center>この地に　渦巻いていた悪しき瘴気…魔瘴により
我は　チカラを失い　マアモンを封じることも
鉱山に　恵みを与えることもできずにいた。
3622.ko:
<voice 06233_00003622><center>난 이 땅에 맴돌던 사악한 독기…
마장 때문에 힘을 잃어 마몬을 봉인할 수도
광산에 은혜를 내릴 수도 없었다.
3622.zh-Hans:
<voice 06233_00003622><center>这片大地出现扑天盖地的邪恶瘴气……魔瘴后，
我便失去力量，既无法封印玛蒙，
也无法为矿山提供恩泽。
3622.zh-Hant:
<voice 06233_00003622><center>這片大地出現撲天蓋地的邪惡瘴氣……魔瘴後，
我便失去力量，既無法封印瑪蒙，
也無法為礦山提供恩澤。

3623.en:
<voice 06303_00003623><center>However, that white light...
The light of the Hero's Awakening caused the miasma to disappear, and I regained my power.
3623.ja:
<voice 06303_00003623><center>だが　あの白き光……
勇者覚醒の光により　魔瘴は消え
我は　チカラを取り戻した。
3623.ko:
<voice 06303_00003623><center>하지만 그 하얀 빛……
용사 각성의 빛 덕분에 마장이 사라져
나도 힘을 되찾을 수 있었다.
3623.zh-Hans:
<voice 06303_00003623><center>但是那道白光……
也就是勇者觉醒之光的照耀下，魔瘴消失，
我也恢复了力量。
3623.zh-Hant:
<voice 06303_00003623><center>但是那道白光……
也就是勇者覺醒之光的照耀下，魔瘴消失，
我也恢復了力量。

26750.en:
<voice 06613_00026750><center>From now on, I promise you that I, Mountain God Yppchal,
shall once again watch over all those in the mine.
26750.ja:
<voice 06613_00026750><center>これからは　ふたたび　この山神イプチャルが
鉱山に関わる　すべての者たちを
見守ってゆくと　約束しよう。
26750.ko:
<voice 06613_00026750><center>앞으로는 다시금 나 산신 이프찰이
광산에서 일하는 모든 이들을
지켜보겠노라고 약속하마.
26750.zh-Hans:
<voice 06613_00026750><center>今后，我山神伊普查尔会再次
担负起保护矿山周围所有人的责任。
这是我与你们的约定。
26750.zh-Hant:
<voice 06613_00026750><center>今後，我山神伊普查爾會再次
擔負起保護礦山周圍所有人的責任。
這是我與你們的約定。

26751.en:
<voice 06703_00026751><center>But never forget, Dwarves.
The fangs of greed are always lurking in your hearts...
26751.ja:
<voice 06703_00026751><center>だが　ゆめゆめ忘れるな　ドワーフたちよ。
欲望の牙は　おぬしらの心に
常に　ひそんでいることを……。
26751.ko:
<voice 06703_00026751><center>허나 절대로 잊어서는 안 된다, 드워프들이여.
욕망의 이빨은 항상
그대들의 마음에 숨어 있다는 것을…….
26751.zh-Hans:
<voice 06703_00026751><center>但是多瓦夫朋友们，千万别忘记，
欲望之牙
时时都潜伏在你们的心里……
26751.zh-Hant:
<voice 06703_00026751><center>但是多瓦夫朋友們，千萬別忘記，
慾望之牙
時時都潛伏在你們的心裡……

3625.en:
<voice 06966_00003625><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>I knew it... The blessings of the Mountain God Yppchal
were weakened by the demon miasma...<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3625.ja:
<voice 06966_00003625><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「やはり……。
　山神イプチャルの加護が　弱まっていたのは
　魔瘴の影響であったか……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3625.ko:
<voice 06966_00003625><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 역시…….
　산신 이프찰의 가호가 약해졌던 건
　마장 때문이었나…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3625.zh-Hans:
<voice 06966_00003625><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>不出所料……
是魔瘴削弱了
山神伊普查尔的祝福……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3625.zh-Hant:
<voice 06966_00003625><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>不出所料……
是魔瘴削弱了山神伊普查爾的庇護……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3626.en:
<voice 06996_00003626><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>And as for that white light that saved us...
At long last, it seems that the Legendary Hero has...<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3626.ja:
<voice 06996_00003626><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「そして　わしらを救った　あの白き光……
　ついに伝説の勇者が……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3626.ko:
<voice 06996_00003626><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 그리고 우리를 구한 그 하얀 빛……
　마침내 전설의 용사가…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3626.zh-Hans:
<voice 06996_00003626><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>而那道拯救了我们的白光……
传说中的勇者终于……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3626.zh-Hant:
<voice 06996_00003626><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>而那道拯救了我們的白光……
傳說中的勇者終於……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3627.en: <voice 07045_00003627><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, thanks! Because of you, we were saved!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3627.ja:
<voice 07045_00003627><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>　ありがとな！
　お前のおかげで　助かったぜ！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3627.ko:
<voice 07045_00003627><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 고맙다, <cs_pchero>!
　네 덕에 살았다!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3627.zh-Hans:
<voice 07045_00003627><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，谢谢你！
是你救了我们！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3627.zh-Hant:
<voice 07045_00003627><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，謝謝你！
是你救了我們！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3628.en: <voice 07129_00003628><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>...Yes, that is true. I wish to discuss that as well.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3628.ja:
<voice 07129_00003628><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「……そうであった。
　そのことについても　話しておかねば。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3628.ko:
<voice 07129_00003628><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: ……참, 그렇지.
　그 문제에 관해서도 얘기를 해야겠군.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3628.zh-Hans:
<voice 07129_00003628><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……是啊，
关于那件事，是时候说清楚了。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3628.zh-Hant:
<voice 07129_00003628><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……是啊，
關於那件事，是時候說清楚了。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3629.en:
<voice 07147_00003629><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, return to Hottsi's house. There is
something I wish to discuss with you.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3629.ja:
<voice 07147_00003629><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>　親方の家に戻るぞ。
　お前に　話したいことがある。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3629.ko:
<voice 07147_00003629><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 감독님 집으로 돌아가세.
　자네에게 해야 할 이야기가 있으니.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3629.zh-Hans:
<voice 07147_00003629><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，回老大家去吧。
我有些话要对你说。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3629.zh-Hant:
<voice 07147_00003629><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，回師傅家去吧。
我有些話要跟你說。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3630.en: <voice 00265_00003630><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>I have been waiting for you, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3630.ja: <voice 00265_00003630><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「待ちかねたぞ　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3630.ko: <voice 00265_00003630><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 기다리고 있었네, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3630.zh-Hans: <voice 00265_00003630><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>我等你很久了，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3630.zh-Hant: <voice 00265_00003630><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>我等你很久了，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3632.en:
<voice 00310_00003632><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>For some reason, I'm only able to stay awake for a short
time. Forgive me, but this discussion must be brief.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3632.ja:
<voice 00310_00003632><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「わしが　こうして起きていられるのは
　ワケあって　わずかな時間だけなのだ。
　悪いが　手短に話させてもらうぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3632.ko:
<voice 00310_00003632><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 사정이 있어서 난
　깨어 있을 수 있는 시간이 길지 않네.
　미안하지만 요점만 간략하게 얘기하지.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3632.zh-Hans:
<voice 00310_00003632><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>出于某些原因，
我没办法长时间保持清醒。
不好意思，我就长话短说了。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3632.zh-Hant:
<voice 00310_00003632><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>出於某些原因，
我沒辦法長時間保持清醒。
不好意思，我就長話短說了。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3633.en:
<voice 00350_00003633><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><pc>, your true form is not that of a Dwarf,
but that of a Human, is it not?<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3633.ja:
<voice 00350_00003633><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。お前の　本当の姿は
　ドワーフではなく　人間なのであろう？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3633.ko:
<voice 00350_00003633><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 자네의 진짜 모습은
　드워프가 아니라 인간이지?<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3633.zh-Hans:
<voice 00350_00003633><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><pc>，你其实不是多瓦夫，
而是人类对吧？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3633.zh-Hant:
<voice 00350_00003633><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001><pc>，你其實不是多瓦夫，
而是人類對吧？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

11280.en: <voice 00418_00011280><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>Hottsi, please try reflecting <pc> in that mirror.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
11280.ja:
<voice 00418_00011280><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「ホッツィ。
　その鏡で　<pc>を　映してみてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
11280.ko:
<voice 00418_00011280><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 홋찌.
　그 거울로 {pc}|hpp(을,를) 비춰 보게나.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
11280.zh-Hans:
<voice 00418_00011280><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>霍崔，
请用那面镜子照一照<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
11280.zh-Hant:
<voice 00418_00011280><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>霍崔，
請用那面鏡子照一照<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3635.en: <voice 00865_00003635><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>As I suspected...<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3635.ja: <voice 00865_00003635><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「やはりか……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3635.ko: <voice 00865_00003635><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 역시 그랬군…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3635.zh-Hans: <voice 00865_00003635><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>我就知道……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3635.zh-Hant: <voice 00865_00003635><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>我就知道……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3636.en:
<voice 00930_00003636><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>This mirror is the legendary Ra's Mirror, which is said to
reflect one's true form.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3636.ja:
<voice 00930_00003636><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「その鏡は　真実の姿を映しだすという
　伝説の　ラーの鏡。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3636.ko:
<voice 00930_00003636><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 그 거울은 진실된 모습을 비춘다는
　전설의 라의 거울일세.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3636.zh-Hans:
<voice 00930_00003636><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>那面镜子就是传说中
能显示真相的太阳神镜。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3636.zh-Hant:
<voice 00930_00003636><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>那面鏡子就是傳說中
能顯示真相的拉之鏡。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3637.en:
<voice 01010_00003637><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>During the battle with Mammon, we all were drained of
our strength, and couldn't even move—but you alone
could still fight, couldn't you?<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3637.ja:
<voice 01010_00003637><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「マアモンと戦ったとき　わしらは
　チカラを奪われ　身動きできなくなったが
　お前だけは　戦うことができたな？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3637.ko:
<voice 01010_00003637><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 마몬과 싸울 때 우리는
　힘을 빼앗겨 움직일 수 없었지만
　자네는 움직일 수 있었지?<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3637.zh-Hans:
<voice 01010_00003637><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>和玛蒙战斗时，
我们都被夺走力量，全身动弹不得，
只有你能继续战斗。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3637.zh-Hant:
<voice 01010_00003637><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>和瑪蒙戰鬥時，
我們都被奪走力量，全身動彈不得，
只有你能繼續戰鬥。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3638.en:
<voice 01165_00003638><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>That is without a doubt because the soul that dwells
in your body is not that of a Dwarf, but of a human.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3638.ja:
<voice 01165_00003638><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「それは　お前の身に宿る魂が　ドワーフでなく
　人間のものだったからに　相違ない。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3638.ko:
<voice 01165_00003638><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 그건 필시 자네 몸에 깃든 영혼이
　드워프가 아니라 인간이기 때문일 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3638.zh-Hans:
<voice 01165_00003638><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>这表示存在于你体内的灵魂并非多瓦夫，
而是人类。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3638.zh-Hant:
<voice 01165_00003638><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>這表示存在於你體內的靈魂並非多瓦夫，
而是人類。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3639.en: <voice 01191_00003639><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>I know what this is. Why you became as you are...<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3639.ja:
<voice 01191_00003639><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「わしには　わかる。
　なぜ　お前が　その姿となったのか……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3639.ko:
<voice 01191_00003639><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 난 알 수 있네.
　자네가 왜 그런 모습이 됐는지…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3639.zh-Hans:
<voice 01191_00003639><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>我知道
你变成这样的原因……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3639.zh-Hant:
<voice 01191_00003639><start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>我知道
你變成這樣的原因……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3642.ja: <voice 01360_00003642><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ブ　ブロッゲンさま！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3642.ko: <voice 01360_00003642><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 브, 브록겐 님!?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3642.zh-Hans: <voice 01360_00003642><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>布、布罗根大人？！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3642.zh-Hant: <voice 01360_00003642><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>布、布羅根大人！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3643.ja: <voice 01388_00003643><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>「ぐう　ぐう……。<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3643.ko: <voice 01388_00003643><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>: 쿨…… 쿨…….<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3644.en:
<voice 01404_00003644><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Master Broggen's Staff, please tell me, what was he
going to say!?
3644.ja:
<voice 01404_00003644><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさまの杖さま。
　なんとか　おっしゃってくださいよ！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3644.ko:
<voice 01404_00003644><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님의 지팡이님.
　뭐라고 말씀 좀 해 보십쇼!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3644.zh-Hans:
<voice 01404_00003644><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>布罗根大人的手杖大人，
你倒是说说话啊？！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3644.zh-Hant:
<voice 01404_00003644><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>布羅根大人的法杖大人，
你倒是說說話啊！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3646.en: <voice 01480_00003646><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>OOH, for crying out loud!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3646.ja: <voice 01480_00003646><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「うおー　なんてこったい！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3646.ko: <voice 01480_00003646><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 으악, 이게 무슨 일이란 말인가!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3646.zh-Hans: <voice 01480_00003646><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>哇！怎么会这样！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3646.zh-Hant: <voice 01480_00003646><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>哇！怎麼會這樣！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3647.en:
<voice 01518_00003647><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>...<pc>. It seems that Master Broggen pushed
himself a bit too hard speaking with you.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3647.ja:
<voice 01518_00003647><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「……<pc>。
　お前と　しゃべるのに　ブロッゲンさまは
　ちっとばかり　ご無理をなさったようだ。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3647.ko:
<voice 01518_00003647><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: ……<pc>.
　너와 이야기하느라 브록겐 님이
　조금 무리하신 모양이다.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3647.zh-Hans:
<voice 01518_00003647><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……<pc>，
看来布罗根大人为了和你说话，
花费太多力气了。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3647.zh-Hant:
<voice 01518_00003647><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……<pc>，
看來布羅根大人為了和你說話，
花費太多力氣了。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3652.en:
<voice 01734_00003652><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>I still find it hard to believe, but... Master Broggen
said that you were a different person than the Dwarf
<pc>, right?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3652.ja:
<voice 01734_00003652><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「まだ　信じられねえけどよ……
　ブロッゲンさまの話じゃ　お前さんは
　ドワーフの　<pc>とは別人なんだろ？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3652.ko:
<voice 01734_00003652><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 아직도 안 믿긴다만……
　브록겐 님의 말씀이 사실이라면 넌 드워프
　{pc}|hpp(이,가) 아니라 다른 사람이란 거지?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3652.zh-Hans:
<voice 01734_00003652><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>我还是没办法相信……
布罗根大人说
你和多瓦夫的<pc>不是同一人？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3652.zh-Hant:
<voice 01734_00003652><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>我還是沒辦法相信……
布羅根大人說
你和多瓦夫的<pc>不是同一人？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3653.en:
<voice 01839_00003653><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>They were newbie apprentice that never complained and
worked hard for me.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3653.ja:
<voice 01839_00003653><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「あいつは　ぺーぺーの見習いだったが
　文句も言わずに　よく　はたらいてくれてたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3653.ko:
<voice 01839_00003653><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 그 녀석은 아직 수습이긴 했어도
　불평 한 마디 없이 열심히 일했어.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3653.zh-Hans:
<voice 01839_00003653><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>那家伙只是个菜鸟实习生，
但做事非常勤奋，没有任何怨言。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3653.zh-Hant:
<voice 01839_00003653><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>那傢伙只是個菜鳥實習生，
但做事非常勤奮，沒有任何怨言。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3654.en:
<voice 01866_00003654><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>They always said that one day they were gonna travel
the world, and dig up some unbelievable treasure, that
was their catchphrase...<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3654.ja:
<voice 01866_00003654><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「いつか　世界をマタにかけて
　とんでもない　お宝を　掘りだしてやるってのが
　あいつの　クチぐせだったんだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3654.ko:
<voice 01866_00003654><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 언젠가 전 세계를 누비며
　엄청난 보물을 캐는 게 꿈이라고
　입버릇처럼 말했었지…….<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3654.zh-Hans:
<voice 01866_00003654><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>那家伙老是说，
自己总有一天要跑遍世界，
挖出不得了的宝物……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3654.zh-Hant:
<voice 01866_00003654><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>那傢伙老是說，
自己總有一天要跑遍世界，
挖出不了得的寶物……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3655.en:
<voice 01959_00003655><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>So, if you can use their body to do something huge for
them, I think that they could rest in peace.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3655.ja:
<voice 01959_00003655><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「だからよ。もし　お前が　その身体を使って
　何かデカイことを　やりとげてくれれば
　あいつも　浮かばれると思う。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3655.ko:
<voice 01959_00003655><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 그러니 네가 그 몸으로
　뭔가 대단한 일을 이뤄내면
　그 녀석도 저세상에서 흐뭇해할 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3655.zh-Hans:
<voice 01959_00003655><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>所以，你要是能用他的身体
做出一番事业，
相信他会很欣慰的。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3655.zh-Hant:
<voice 01959_00003655><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>所以，你要是能用他的身體
做出一番事業，
相信他會很欣慰的。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3656.ja: <voice 02009_00003656><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「そうだよ！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3656.ko: <voice 02009_00003656><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 그래, 맞아!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3657.en: <voice 02059_00003657><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>WHOA! Master Broggen's Staff!?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3657.ja:
<voice 02059_00003657><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「うわっ！
　ブロッゲンさまの杖さま！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3657.ko:
<voice 02059_00003657><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 으앗!
　브록겐 님의 지팡이님!?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3657.zh-Hans:
<voice 02059_00003657><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>哇！
布罗根大人的手杖大人？！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3657.zh-Hant:
<voice 02059_00003657><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>哇！
布羅根大人的法杖大人！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001424.en:
<voice 02104_19001424><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>These are master Broggen's wooords! "Those, like
<pc>, who come back to life in a new form
must have a mission to fulfill".<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001424.ja:
<voice 02104_19001424><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさまは　おっしゃっておらレール！
　<pc>のように　姿を変えて
　生き返った者には　果たすべき　使命があると。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001424.ko:
<voice 02104_19001424><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님은 이렇게 말씀하고 계시니~라!
　<pc>처럼 다른 모습으로
　되살아난 자에게는 이뤄야 할 사명이 있다고.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001424.zh-Hans:
<voice 02104_19001424><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布罗根大人如是说！
<pc>这样的起死回生之人
一定肩负了某种使命。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001424.zh-Hant:
<voice 02104_19001424><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布羅根大人如是說！
像<pc>這樣改變形態，起死回生之人
一定肩負了某種使命。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02104_19001425><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>These are master Broggen's wooords! "Those, like
<pc>, who come back to life in a new form
must have a mission to fulfill".<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001425.ja:
<voice 02104_19001425><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさまは　おっしゃっておらレール！
　<pc>のように　姿を変えて
　生き返った者には　果たすべき　使命があると。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001425.ko:
<voice 02104_19001425><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님은 이렇게 말씀하고 계시니~라!
　<pc>처럼 다른 모습으로
　되살아난 자에게는 이뤄야 할 사명이 있다고.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02104_19001425><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>布罗根大人如是说！
<pc>这样的起死回生之人

像<pc>這樣改變形態，起死回生之人
一定肩負了某種使命。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3659.ja: <voice 02214_00003659><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>「ぐう　ぐう……。<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3659.ko: <voice 02214_00003659><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>: 쿨…… 쿨…….<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3660.en:
<voice 02254_00003660><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>"What that mission is, you shall learn when the time
comes"...<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3660.ja:
<voice 02254_00003660><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「その使命が　なんであるかは
　いずれ　時が来れば　わかるとして……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3660.ko:
<voice 02254_00003660><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 그 사명이 무엇인지는
　때가 되면 자연히 알 수 있을 테니……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3660.zh-Hans:
<voice 02254_00003660><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>那个使命是什么，
未来总有一天会揭晓……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3660.zh-Hant:
<voice 02254_00003660><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>那個使命是什麼，
未來總有一天會揭曉……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3661.en:
<voice 02334_00003661><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>To assist you in fulfilling that mission, I shall give you
sooomething.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3661.ja:
<voice 02334_00003661><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「使命を果たすために　助けとなるものを
　今から　授けるのでアール。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3661.ko:
<voice 02334_00003661><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 사명을 이루는 데
　도움이 될 만한 물건을
　주겠다고 하시니~라.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3661.zh-Hans:
<voice 02334_00003661><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>为了帮助你完成使命，
现在有个东西要交给你是也。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3661.zh-Hant:
<voice 02334_00003661><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>為了幫助你完成使命，
現在有個東西要交給你是也。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3662.ja: <voice 02422_00003662><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>「ぐう　ぐう……。<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3662.ko: <voice 02422_00003662><start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>: 쿨…… 쿨…….<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3663.en: <voice 02459_00003663><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Now, get out your Adventure Looog!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3663.ja: <voice 02459_00003663><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「さあ　冒険の書を出すのでアール！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3663.ko: <voice 02459_00003663><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 자, 모험의 서를 꺼내 봐라!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3663.zh-Hans: <voice 02459_00003663><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>好，把冒险之书拿出来吧是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3663.zh-Hant: <voice 02459_00003663><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>好，把冒險之書拿出來吧是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3664.en: <voice 02564_00003664><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Magic Staff... SPAAAAARK!!!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3664.ja: <voice 02564_00003664><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「杖サマ……　スパーーーーク！！！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3664.ko: <voice 02564_00003664><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 지팡이님…… 스파크!!!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3664.zh-Hans: <voice 02564_00003664><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>手杖大人要发功了！！！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3664.zh-Hant: <voice 02564_00003664><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>法杖大人要發功了！！！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3665.en:
<voice 02694_00003665><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Whoaaa, the Mark of Adulthood appeared on your
Adventure Log!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3665.ja:
<voice 02694_00003665><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「おおおっ　一人前の証が
　<pc>の　冒険の書に！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3665.ko:
<voice 02694_00003665><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 오오오, 모험가의 증표가
　<pc>의 모험의 서에!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3665.zh-Hans:
<voice 02694_00003665><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>合格者的证明出现在
<pc>的冒险之书上了！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3665.zh-Hant:
<voice 02694_00003665><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>喔喔喔，合格者之證出現在
<pc>的冒險之書上了！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3666.en:
<voice 02799_00003666><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Good for you, <pc>! Now you'll be recognized as
a full-fledged member of society no matter where you
go!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3666.ja:
<voice 02799_00003666><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「よかったな　<pc>！
　これで　お前は　どこの国へ行っても
　一人前だと　認められるぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3666.ko:
<voice 02799_00003666><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 축하한다, <pc>!
　이제 어딜 가든 모두가 널
　어엿한 모험가로 인정해 줄 거다!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3666.zh-Hans:
<voice 02799_00003666><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>太好了，<pc>！
这样任何国家都会承认
你是独当一面的人才！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3666.zh-Hant:
<voice 02799_00003666><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>太好了，<pc>！
這樣任何國家都會承認
你是獨當一面的人才！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3667.en:
<voice 02879_00003667><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>With this, it's possible that even the great kings of other
lands may look to you for help!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3667.ja:
<voice 02879_00003667><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「異国の　おえらい王さまだって
　お前のことを　頼りにしてくれるかもな！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3667.ko:
<voice 02879_00003667><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 이국의 대단한 왕도
　네 도움을 필요로 할지도 모르지!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3667.zh-Hans:
<voice 02879_00003667><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>其他国家的国王
说不定也会找你帮忙呢！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3667.zh-Hant:
<voice 02879_00003667><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>其他國家的國王
說不定也會找你幫忙呢！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3668.en:
<voice 02909_00003668><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Yes. If you make an impact any of the large towns or
countries of each continent, you shall receive a key-like
medal, called a "Key Emblem".<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3668.ja:
<voice 02909_00003668><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「うん。各大陸の大きな町や国で　活躍すれば
　その証として　キーエンブレムっていう
　カギみたいな勲章を　もらえることがあるんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3668.ko:
<voice 02909_00003668><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 그래, 각 대륙의 큰 마을이나 나라에서
　활약하면 그 증표로 키 엠블럼이라는
　열쇠 모양의 훈장을 주기도 하지.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3668.zh-Hans:
<voice 02909_00003668><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>嗯，在各个大陆的大城市或国家闯出成绩的话，
就会获得一种像钥匙一样的徽章，
叫键徽。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3668.zh-Hant:
<voice 02909_00003668><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>嗯，在各個大陸的大城市或國家闖出成績的話，
就會獲得一種像鑰匙一樣的徽章，
叫做鑰徽。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3669.en:
<voice 02951_00003669><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>First, you must go around the world collecting those
Key Emblems as proof of your abilities!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3669.ja:
<voice 02951_00003669><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「まずは　世界中をめぐり　自分の実力の証として
　そのキーエンブレムを　集めるんだよ！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3669.ko:
<voice 02951_00003669><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 우선 전 세계를 돌며
　네 능력을 증명할 수 있게
　그 키 엠블럼을 모으도록!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3669.zh-Hans:
<voice 02951_00003669><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>你就到世界各地去看看，
一边证明自己的实力，一边搜集键徽吧！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3669.zh-Hant:
<voice 02951_00003669><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>你就到世界各地去蒐集鑰徽，
證明自己的實力吧！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3671.en:
<voice 02989_00003671><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Now, the true adventure begins, <pc>!
First, head northwest of Agrani, towards the Mount
Gatara!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3671.ja:
<voice 02989_00003671><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「さあ　本当の冒険の始まりだ　<pc>！
　まずは　このアグラニから　北西にある町
　岳都ガタラを　目指すんだ！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3671.ko:
<voice 02989_00003671><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 진정한 모험의 시작이다, <pc>!
　우선 아그라니 북서쪽에 있는
　산악 도시 가타라로 가라!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3671.zh-Hans:
<voice 02989_00003671><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>好，真正的冒险开始了，<pc>！
首先以阿古拉尼为起点，
向西北方的山城加塔拉前进吧！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3671.zh-Hant:
<voice 02989_00003671><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>好，真正的冒險開始了，<pc>！
首先以阿古拉尼為起點，
向西北方的山城加塔拉前進吧！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3672.en: <voice 03055_00003672><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>...Thus concludes Master Broggen's messaaage!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3672.ja:
<voice 03055_00003672><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「……と　ブロッゲンさまのお話は
　以上でアール！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3672.ko:
<voice 03055_00003672><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: ……브록겐 님의 말씀은
　이걸로 끝이니~라!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3672.zh-Hans:
<voice 03055_00003672><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……布罗根大人要告诉你的
就是这些是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3672.zh-Hant:
<voice 03055_00003672><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……布羅根大人要告訴你的
就是這些是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3673.en:
<voice 03109_00003673><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>We, too, shall depart on a journey. That white light...
To investigate the cause of the Hero's Awakening, we
must be goooing!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3673.ja:
<voice 03109_00003673><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「我々も　もう　旅に出ることにするから。
　あの白い光……　勇者覚醒の原因を探るため
　行かなくてはならないのでアール！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3673.ko:
<voice 03109_00003673><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 우리도 여행을 떠나야 하니까.
　그 하얀 빛…… 용사 각성의 원인을
　찾으러 나서야 하느니~라!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3673.zh-Hans:
<voice 03109_00003673><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>我们也要去旅行了。
我们必须去弄清楚那道白光……
也就是勇者觉醒的原因是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3673.zh-Hant:
<voice 03109_00003673><start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>我們也要去旅行了。
我們必須去弄清楚那道白光……
也就是勇者覺醒的原因是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

3674.en:
<voice 03139_00003674><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>That was a bit of a large scale story, but I'm rooting
for you too! Good luck, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3674.ja:
<voice 03139_00003674><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「なんだか　スケールのでっかい話になったが
　オレも　お前のこと　応援してるからな！
　がんばれよ　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3674.ko:
<voice 03139_00003674><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 어째 스케일이 커진 느낌이 든다만
　나도 널 응원하마!
　힘내라, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3674.zh-Hans:
<voice 03139_00003674><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>这件事听起来非同小可，
不过我会替你加油的！
加油，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
3674.zh-Hant:
<voice 03139_00003674><start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>這件事聽起來非同小可，
不過我會替你加油的！
加油，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26745.en:
<voice 00030_00026745><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>That thing you see behind me's called a Divine Machine.
It's Agrani's prized elevator.<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26745.ja:
<voice 00030_00026745><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>「オレの後ろに見えるのは
　神カラクリと言ってな。
　アグラニ自慢の　昇降機なのさ。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26745.ko:
<voice 00030_00026745><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>: 내 뒤에 있는 건
　일명 신의 기구라고 불리는
　아그라니의 자랑거리, 승강기다.<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26745.zh-Hans:
<voice 00030_00026745><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>我身后这台升降机，
就是阿古拉尼
引以为傲的神业。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26745.zh-Hant:
<voice 00030_00026745><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>你可以看到我後面這台東西，
它叫作神之機關，
這可是阿古拉尼引以為傲的升降機呢。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26746.en:
<voice 00245_00026746><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>Heheheeeh. If you use this Divine Machine, you'll be
able to reach uptown instantly.<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26746.ja:
<voice 00245_00026746><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>「ふっふっふ。この神カラクリを使えば
　上の町まで　一瞬で行けるぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26746.ko:
<voice 00245_00026746><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>: 후후후, 이 신의 기구를 사용하면
　윗마을까지 단숨에 갈 수 있지.<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26746.zh-Hans:
<voice 00245_00026746><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>呵呵呵。搭乘这神业的话，
一瞬间就能到上方城镇去了。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26746.zh-Hant:
<voice 00245_00026746><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，只要使用這台神之機關，
一轉眼就能到達上方市鎮了。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27034.en:
<voice 00295_00027034><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>That thing you see across from the door is the Divine
Machine's switch. If you want to go uptown, you
should try checking it out.<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27034.ja:
<voice 00295_00027034><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>「扉の横に　見えるのが
　神カラクリを動かすスイッチだ。
　上の町に行きたいのなら　調べてみるといい。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27034.ko:
<voice 00295_00027034><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>: 문 옆에 있는 게
　신의 기구를 작동시키는 스위치다.
　윗마을에 가고 싶다면 조사해 봐.<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27034.zh-Hans:
<voice 00295_00027034><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>门旁边你看到的那个
是启动神业的开关。
想去上方城镇的话，就调查一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27034.zh-Hant:
<voice 00295_00027034><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>門旁邊的那個
是啟動神之機關的開關。
想去上方市鎮的話，就調查一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26747.en:
<voice 00355_00026747><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>This Divine Machine thing is thousands of years old,
it seems...<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26747.ja:
<voice 00355_00026747><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>「この神カラクリってヤツは
　何千年も前の　時代のものらしいが……。<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26747.ko:
<voice 00355_00026747><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>: 이 신의 기구란 놈은
　몇천 년 전의 물건이라는데…….<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26747.zh-Hans:
<voice 00355_00026747><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>这台神业
据说是好几千年前的东西……<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26747.zh-Hant:
<voice 00355_00026747><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>聽說這台神之機關
是幾千年前的東西……<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26748.en:
<voice 00430_00026748><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>Even now, it can still carry us all the way to the top.
It's an amazing invention, isn't it!<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26748.ja:
<voice 00430_00026748><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>「今でも　オレたちを乗せて
　スーッと上まで　運んでくれる。
　いやはや　すごい発明品だよなあ！<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26748.ko:
<voice 00430_00026748><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>: 지금도 우리를 태우고
　순식간에 위로 데려다 주지.
　정말 대단한 발명품이야!<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26748.zh-Hans:
<voice 00430_00026748><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>可如今依然能够运转，
嗖地一下就能把我们送到上面去。
真是个了不起的发明啊！<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26748.zh-Hant:
<voice 00430_00026748><start_lip_sync n00508 _normal m00001>但它現在也能咻的一下
把我們送到上面去喔。
哎呀，真是厲害的發明啊！<stop_lip_animation n00508 CLOSE_MOUTH>
